MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Over ❛there❜ was where I wished to be.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Over ❛there❜ was where I wished to be.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 指さす向こうに広がるは、海原。
MESSAGE.EN: Her finger was pointing at the distant horizon.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her finger was pointing at the distant horizon.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「『わたし』が、そこに行ったとしても『わたし』はずっと皆さんの傍にいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Even once ❛I❜ reached there, ❛I❜ would still have been with everyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Even once ❛I❜ reached there, ❛I❜ would still have been with everyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「美鳥…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Midori...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Midori...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いえ、もう今はあの子が『美魚』です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No, she's already ❛Mio❜ now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No, she's already ❛Mio❜ now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「皆さんがそう定義した以上、あの子が美魚なんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝As long as other people recognize her as Mio, that's who she is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝As long as other people recognize her as Mio, that's who she is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そして『わたし』は、誰でもない『わたし』になるんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And ❛I❜ am nobody but ❛I.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And ❛I❜ am nobody but ❛I.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうして…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は声を絞り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: My voice was hoarse.
MESSAGE.Translation: My voice was hoarse.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうして、そんなに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why do you look...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why do you look...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「嬉しそうなのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...so happy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...so happy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笑っている西園さんが、悲しかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her smiling face made my heart constrict.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her smiling face made my heart constrict.

MESSAGE.JP: なんで。
MESSAGE.EN: Why...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why...

MESSAGE.JP: そんな清々しい顔をしているんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: How can she look so at peace?
MESSAGE.Translation: How can she look so at peace?

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「解き放たれる、から…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's probably because I'm about to be released...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's probably because I'm about to be released...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「西園美魚、であることから自由になれるからでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm about to be released from being Mio Nishizono.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm about to be released from being Mio Nishizono.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん、あなただけはまだわたしのことを『美魚』だと認識しています」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, you are the only one that still recognizes me as ❛Mio.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, you are the only one that still recognizes me as ❛Mio.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…どうか、お願いです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Please.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Please.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしを、名前も持たないひとりの『わたし』にしてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Please let me simply be 'me,' someone without a name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Please let me simply be 'me,' someone without a name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はずっと西園さんを見ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I had been watching her this whole time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had been watching her this whole time.

MESSAGE.JP: わずかでも目を逸らせば、ほんの瞬きをしてしまったら。
MESSAGE.EN: Held by the fear that she would disappear yet again,
MESSAGE.Translation: Held by the fear that she would disappear yet again,

MESSAGE.JP: 消えてしまいそうだったから。
MESSAGE.EN: if I looked away for even an instant.
MESSAGE.Translation: if I looked away for even an instant.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん、…美鳥って一体誰なのさ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san... I want you to tell me who Midori really is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san... I want you to tell me who Midori really is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少しでも、その先延ばしをしたくて。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to say something to her, anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to say something to her, anything.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は口を開く。
MESSAGE.EN: So desperate was I to keep her in front of me for even a little longer.
MESSAGE.Translation: So desperate was I to keep her in front of me for even a little longer.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あの子からは、何も聞いてないのですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Didn't she tell you anything about herself?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Didn't she tell you anything about herself?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんがなくした影、とだけしか教えてくれなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I learned that she was the shadow you'd lost.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I learned that she was the shadow you'd lost.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、その答えは八十点だとも言っていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, also, she said it was only 80 percent correct at most.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, also, she said it was only 80 percent correct at most.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は…西園さんが日傘をしている本当の理由を知ってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now I know... why you're always holding that parasol.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now I know... why you're always holding that parasol.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから、信じないわけじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, I do believe what she said.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, I do believe what she said.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、やっぱりよくわからないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I still don't understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I still don't understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんの願いは、美鳥とどんな関係があるのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What does she have to do with your wish?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What does she have to do with your wish?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…僕に、教えてくれないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I would like you to tell me that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I would like you to tell me that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そうですか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝All right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝All right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: それだけ呟くと、西園さんは黙ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: After muttering those words, she fell silent.
MESSAGE.Translation: After muttering those words, she fell silent.

MESSAGE.JP: 天を仰ぐようにして、何ごとか考えている。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking up to the sky, she seemed to be lost in thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking up to the sky, she seemed to be lost in thought.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はただ、次に西園さんの口から紡がれる言葉を、待っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I could do nothing but wait for her to open her mouth again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could do nothing but wait for her to open her mouth again.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…これは矛盾した願いです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I have this contradictory wish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I have this contradictory wish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 視線を僕に戻し、西園さんが口を開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She started speaking, turning her eyes back to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started speaking, turning her eyes back to me.

MESSAGE.JP: そして…手にしていた日傘を手放した。
MESSAGE.EN: And then... she let go of her parasol.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then... she let go of her parasol.

MESSAGE.JP: 白い傘は、白い砂浜に音もなく落ちる。
MESSAGE.EN: The white parasol landed on the white beach without making a sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: The white parasol landed on the white beach without making a sound.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「よく見てください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Please look down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Please look down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言われるまでもなく、僕の目線は西園さんの足下に向いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Before she directed me, my gaze had already homed to the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before she directed me, my gaze had already homed to the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: あるべきものが、ない。
MESSAGE.EN: What was supposed to be there, was not.
MESSAGE.Translation: What was supposed to be there, was not.

MESSAGE.JP: 西に傾くにはまだ早い太陽が、西園さんの影を不自然に浜辺に映す。
MESSAGE.EN: Under the sun, still high in the sky, Nishizono-san's shadow extended unnaturally on the sand of the beach.
MESSAGE.Translation: Under the sun, still high in the sky, Nishizono-san's shadow extended unnaturally on the sand of the beach.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしのことを忘れて欲しいと願っているそのわたしが、直枝さんにこんなことを頼むのは、とても矛盾した願いです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Even while I'm asking you to forget me, I have this contradictory desire.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Even while I'm asking you to forget me, I have this contradictory desire.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どうか…憶えていてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Please... don't forget.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Please... don't forget.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしのことは忘れても、わたしの罪だけは忘れないでいてくれますか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You don't have to remember me, but please don't forget my sin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You don't have to remember me, but please don't forget my sin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 忘れてほしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She wanted me to forget her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wanted me to forget her.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、忘れないで。
MESSAGE.EN: But she also asked me not to forget about something she had done.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she also asked me not to forget about something she had done.

MESSAGE.JP: まさに矛盾した――だから、人間の願いだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was indeed a contradiction... but, that was also what made it a very human desire.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was indeed a contradiction... but, that was also what made it a very human desire.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんは、本当は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, I think you actually...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, I think you actually...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が続けようとした言葉を西園さんは遮る。
MESSAGE.EN: She cut off my words.
MESSAGE.Translation: She cut off my words.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…美鳥はわたしのなくした影」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Midori is the shadow I've lost.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Midori is the shadow I've lost.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あの子は、そう言ったんですね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝She told you that much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝She told you that much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…確かに、満点の答えではありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I also have to agree that that's not the complete answer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I also have to agree that that's not the complete answer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …ここは、西園さんの話を聞こう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I decided to listen to everything she was going to tell me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I decided to listen to everything she was going to tell me.

MESSAGE.JP: まずは、それからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That came before everything else.
MESSAGE.Translation: That came before everything else.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「美鳥は――わたしの妹です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Midori... she is my little sister.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Midori... she is my little sister.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしの大切な、妹なんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝She's my precious little sister.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝She's my precious little sister.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 慈しむように、妹という言葉を繰り返した。
MESSAGE.EN: She repeated the words, as though endeared by their sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: She repeated the words, as though endeared by their sound.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…美鳥が、西園さんの妹？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...She's... your little sister?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...She's... your little sister?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごっこ遊び、をしたことがあると思います。
MESSAGE.EN: I figure most people had played make-believe in their childhood.
MESSAGE.Translation: I figure most people had played make-believe in their childhood.

MESSAGE.JP: 漫画やテレビの主人公の真似をする、子供の遊びです。
MESSAGE.EN: It's a game where you imitate a character from a TV show, manga or such.
MESSAGE.Translation: It's a game where you imitate a character from a TV show, manga or such.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしは、絵本の登場人物になりきって遊ぶのが好きでした。
MESSAGE.EN: When I was a child, I tended to act out picture books.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I was a child, I tended to act out picture books.

MESSAGE.JP: 小さい頃から、たくさん本を読みました。
MESSAGE.EN: I had been a well-read person ever since I was small.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had been a well-read person ever since I was small.

MESSAGE.JP: シンデレラに白雪姫や人魚姫、桃太郎に$K46金太郎$K0、$K116浦島太郎$K0、青い鳥、千夜一夜物語、等々。
MESSAGE.EN: Cinderella, Snow White, Little Mermaid, Momotarou, $K46Kintarou$K0, $K116Urashima Tarou$K0, Blue Bird, Arabian Nights, you name it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Cinderella, Snow White, Little Mermaid, Momotarou, $K46Kintarou$K0, $K116Urashima Tarou$K0, Blue Bird, Arabian Nights, you name it.

MESSAGE.JP: 絵本の主人公達は、とても勇敢で、とても賢く、とても綺麗で、とても幸福です。
MESSAGE.EN: The protagonists were all brave, witty, beautiful and favored by fortune.
MESSAGE.Translation: The protagonists were all brave, witty, beautiful and favored by fortune.

MESSAGE.JP: 幼いわたしは本の中の世界に憧れ、でも自分はその世界の住人でないことを哀しく思っていました。
MESSAGE.EN: Though I was taken with the worlds within the books, I was sad that I couldn't myself live in one of those worlds.
MESSAGE.Translation: Though I was taken with the worlds within the books, I was sad that I couldn't myself live in one of those worlds.

MESSAGE.JP: せめて僅かな間だけでも、夢を見られるように。
MESSAGE.EN: To make up for that fact,
MESSAGE.Translation: To make up for that fact,

MESSAGE.JP: わたしはよく、ごっこ遊びをしていました。
MESSAGE.EN: I would play make-believe very often.
MESSAGE.Translation: I would play make-believe very often.

MESSAGE.JP: 新聞紙を丸めれば、勇ましい白馬の騎士となりました。
MESSAGE.EN: With a rolled-up paper for a sword, I could be a knight on a white horse.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a rolled-up paper for a sword, I could be a knight on a white horse.

MESSAGE.JP: ほうきにまたがれば、怪しい年寄りの魔女となりました。
MESSAGE.EN: With a broomstick to ride on, I could be a scary old witch.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a broomstick to ride on, I could be a scary old witch.

MESSAGE.JP: 白い布を頭にかぶれば、美しい異国の花嫁となりました。
MESSAGE.EN: With a white cloth to wear on my head, I could be a beautiful bride from an exotic country.
MESSAGE.Translation: With a white cloth to wear on my head, I could be a beautiful bride from an exotic country.

MESSAGE.JP: その間、わたしは西園美魚ではない『わたし』でした。
MESSAGE.EN: During the game, I was ❛somebody❜ other than Mio Nishizono.
MESSAGE.Translation: During the game, I was ❛somebody❜ other than Mio Nishizono.

MESSAGE.JP: …そして、母に声をかけられて現実に戻る瞬間がたまらなく、辛いと思ったのです。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And I really hated it when I was forced back to reality by my mother calling out to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And I really hated it when I was forced back to reality by my mother calling out to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 幼い子供は妄想と現実の区別がつかない、と言います。
MESSAGE.EN: They say little children cannot distinguish reality from fantasy.
MESSAGE.Translation: They say little children cannot distinguish reality from fantasy.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、少なくともわたしは違いました。
MESSAGE.EN: But at least for me, that wasn't the case.
MESSAGE.Translation: But at least for me, that wasn't the case.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしは区別がついた上で、妄想にひたることを選んでいたのです。
MESSAGE.EN: I could tell, yet I chose to indulge in fantasy.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could tell, yet I chose to indulge in fantasy.

MESSAGE.JP: 両親は共働きで忙しく、あまり家にいる人たちではありませんでした。
MESSAGE.EN: My parents both worked full-time, and they were barely home.
MESSAGE.Translation: My parents both worked full-time, and they were barely home.

MESSAGE.JP: ですが、一緒の時はわたしに優しく、特に不満があったわけではありません。
MESSAGE.EN: That didn't bother me though. When they were with me, they were very kind.
MESSAGE.Translation: That didn't bother me though. When they were with me, they were very kind.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ漠然と――。
MESSAGE.EN: But I was just thinking...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I was just thinking...

MESSAGE.JP: わたしがいる場所はどこか他にあるような気がしていたのです。
MESSAGE.EN: This is not the place where I belong.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is not the place where I belong.

MESSAGE.JP: たまに幼稚園の友達と一緒に遊ぶこともありましたが、多くの場合はわたしひとりで家で遊ぶことが多かったようです。
MESSAGE.EN: I did play with preschool friends at times, but most of my time I spent alone at home.
MESSAGE.Translation: I did play with preschool friends at times, but most of my time I spent alone at home.

MESSAGE.JP: 両親は友達が少なく、ひとりで遊んでばかりしているわたしのことを少し心配しているようでしたが、その頃はまだそれほどでもありませんでした。
MESSAGE.EN: My parents seemed to be concerned that I had so few friends and usually played all by myself, but it didn't seem anything to be too worried about at the time.
MESSAGE.Translation: My parents seemed to be concerned that I had so few friends and usually played all by myself, but it didn't seem anything to be too worried about at the time.

MESSAGE.JP: …今となっては、このように振り返るのは哀しいことなのですが。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I feel a little melancholy looking at my past like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I feel a little melancholy looking at my past like this.

MESSAGE.JP: 話を続けましょう。
MESSAGE.EN: But I digress.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I digress.

MESSAGE.JP: その日。
MESSAGE.EN: One day.
MESSAGE.Translation: One day.

MESSAGE.JP: やはり、両親は家におらず、わたしはひとりで家で遊んでいました。
MESSAGE.EN: My parents, as usual, weren't home and I was playing by myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: My parents, as usual, weren't home and I was playing by myself.

MESSAGE.JP: その日は、白雪姫ごっこだったと思います。
MESSAGE.EN: If I remember correctly, I was playing acting Snow White.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I remember correctly, I was playing acting Snow White.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしはひとりで、姫となり、小人となり、意地悪な継母となりました。
MESSAGE.EN: I was acting the part of not only the princess, but also the dwarfs and even the Evil Queen.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was acting the part of not only the princess, but also the dwarfs and even the Evil Queen.

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「鏡よ、鏡、世界で一番美しいのは、だあれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Mirror, mirror on the wall, who in the land is the fairest of all?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Mirror, mirror on the wall, who in the land is the fairest of all?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何度も読んで憶えてしまった台詞を、母の$K111三面鏡$K0の前で口にしました。
MESSAGE.EN: From my mother's $K111triple mirror$K0, I asked the question which I had learned from the picture book.
MESSAGE.Translation: From my mother's $K111triple mirror$K0, I asked the question which I had learned from the picture book.

MESSAGE.JP: 『それは、白雪姫です』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Snow White is the fairest of all.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Snow White is the fairest of all.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 続いてわたしが、そう答えるはずでした。
MESSAGE.EN: I was supposed to answer that to myself like always.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was supposed to answer that to myself like always.

MESSAGE.JP: ですが、その日は違ったのです。
MESSAGE.EN: However, something unexpected happened instead.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, something unexpected happened instead.

MESSAGE.JP: `？？@『それは白雪姫ですよ、お妃さま』
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝It is Snow White, your Majesty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝It is Snow White, your Majesty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わたしはまだ口を開いていません。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't even open my mouth yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't even open my mouth yet.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、確かに声が聞こえました。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet I heard a voice answer the question.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet I heard a voice answer the question.

MESSAGE.JP: 両親は不在です。
MESSAGE.EN: My parents were out.
MESSAGE.Translation: My parents were out.

MESSAGE.JP: この家には誰もいないはずです。
MESSAGE.EN: Hence, no one was supposed to be inside the house except for me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Hence, no one was supposed to be inside the house except for me.

MESSAGE.JP: `？？@「ねえ、次の台詞はどうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝Hey, what about the next line?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝Hey, what about the next line?❞

MESSAGE.JP: また、声がしました。
MESSAGE.EN: Again the voice came.
MESSAGE.Translation: Again the voice came.

MESSAGE.JP: その声は――わたしの目の前からします。
MESSAGE.EN: And I noticed it had originated from in front of me.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I noticed it had originated from in front of me.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしの前には『わたし』しかいません。
MESSAGE.EN: Before me, there was only ❛myself.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Before me, there was only ❛myself.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 鏡の中のわたしの姿をした『わたし』だけしか。
MESSAGE.EN: Only ❛myself❜ in the mirror.
MESSAGE.Translation: Only ❛myself❜ in the mirror.

MESSAGE.JP: `？？@「さあ、はやく続きを」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝Come on, let's keep going already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝Come on, let's keep going already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わたしがしゃべっていないのに、鏡の中の『わたし』は口を動かします。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I wasn't speaking at all, the ❛myself❜ in the mirror was moving her lips to talk.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I wasn't speaking at all, the ❛myself❜ in the mirror was moving her lips to talk.

MESSAGE.JP: `？？@「ねえってば」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝Are you listening to me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝Are you listening to me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？@「むぅ。やっぱり、このままじゃつまんないっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝Mm, it's boring in here after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝Mm, it's boring in here after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？@「一緒に、あそぼっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝Let's play together!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝Let's play together!❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして、気づけば――。
MESSAGE.EN: And before I noticed it――
MESSAGE.Translation: And before I noticed it――

MESSAGE.JP: わたしの隣には『わたし』がいました。
MESSAGE.EN: The other ❛myself❜ was standing right beside me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The other ❛myself❜ was standing right beside me.

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「あなたは、だれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Who are you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Who are you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鏡の中に映るのは驚いた顔のわたしがいます。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw my surprised face reflected in the mirror.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw my surprised face reflected in the mirror.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしが口を開けば、一緒に動きます。
MESSAGE.EN: And when I opened my mouth, the ❛myself❜ in the mirror did the same.
MESSAGE.Translation: And when I opened my mouth, the ❛myself❜ in the mirror did the same.

MESSAGE.JP: 勝手に口を開くことのない鏡像のわたし、でした。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a plain mirror image this time, without a doubt.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a plain mirror image this time, without a doubt.

MESSAGE.JP: `？？@「やだなあ、自分の妹も忘れちゃったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝Don't tell me you forgot your own little sister.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝Don't tell me you forgot your own little sister.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet again.

MESSAGE.JP: まるで鏡の中から出てきたとしか思えない、隣りに立つもうひとりの『わたし』が答えました。
MESSAGE.EN: The other ❛myself,❜ who could only have stepped out of the mirror, spoke to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The other ❛myself,❜ who could only have stepped out of the mirror, spoke to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「…いもうと？　わたしに妹なんていないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝...My little sister? I don't have one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝...My little sister? I don't have one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「この家はお父さんと、お母さんとわたしだけだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝There's only Mama and Papa and me in this house.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝There's only Mama and Papa and me in this house.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？@「…でも、ここにいるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝...But I am here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝...But I am here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？@「ほら、いるでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝Here, can't you feel me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝Here, can't you feel me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: その子の手が、わたしの頬に触れました。
MESSAGE.EN: She touched me on the cheek.
MESSAGE.Translation: She touched me on the cheek.

MESSAGE.JP: 小さな手のひらの温度が、わたしに伝わります。
MESSAGE.EN: The warmth of her palm was transmitted to my skin.
MESSAGE.Translation: The warmth of her palm was transmitted to my skin.

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「うん、いるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Yes, I can feel you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Yes, I can feel you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？@「でしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝Right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝Right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「…お名前は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝...What's your name?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝...What's your name?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？@「美鳥。妹の名前なんだから、もう忘れちゃダメだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `??@❝Midori. Don't forget your sister's name again, all right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `??@❝Midori. Don't forget your sister's name again, all right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「みどり…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Midori...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Midori...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「そうだよ。お姉ちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝That's right, sis.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝That's right, sis.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「…美鳥」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝...Midori.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝...Midori.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その時、わたしは確かに思い出しました。
MESSAGE.EN: At that moment, I remembered everything.
MESSAGE.Translation: At that moment, I remembered everything.

MESSAGE.JP: 鏡の中から出てきた、なんてどうして錯覚したんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Why did I believe that she had come out of the mirror?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why did I believe that she had come out of the mirror?

MESSAGE.JP: 妹なんていない、なんてどうして間違えたんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Why did I think that I didn't have a sister?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why did I think that I didn't have a sister?

MESSAGE.JP: この子は、わたしの妹です。
MESSAGE.EN: She was, without mistake, my little sister.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was, without mistake, my little sister.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「じゃあ、遊ぼうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Then, let's play.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Then, let's play.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「うん、遊ぼうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わたしの大切な妹です。
MESSAGE.EN: She was my precious little sister.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was my precious little sister.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりで遊ぶと、ごっこ遊びの幅は格段に広がりました。
MESSAGE.EN: Having Midori with me opened up a world of possibilities.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having Midori with me opened up a world of possibilities.

MESSAGE.JP: わたし達は王子様になり、お姫様になり、ドラゴンになり、人魚になり、魔法使いになって、遊びました。
MESSAGE.EN: We played princes, princesses, dragons, mermaids and witches.
MESSAGE.Translation: We played princes, princesses, dragons, mermaids and witches.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしは嬉しかったんです。
MESSAGE.EN: It made me really happy.
MESSAGE.Translation: It made me really happy.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥と一緒だと、夢はまるで夢のようでした。
MESSAGE.EN: Playing with her was just like a dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: Playing with her was just like a dream.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしがひとりで遊んでいたときと、まるで違いました。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything had changed now that I was no longer alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everything had changed now that I was no longer alone.

MESSAGE.JP: それまでの母に声をかけられ、遊ぶのを止めた時の全てを失ったような感覚は、もうありません。
MESSAGE.EN: I never had that empty feeling that came from my mother interrupting my play.
MESSAGE.Translation: I never had that empty feeling that came from my mother interrupting my play.

MESSAGE.JP: 王子様は、わたしが演じないと現れませんでしたが、美鳥はわたしが見ていないところにもいました。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though a knight on a white horse never showed up unless I played him myself, Midori was always there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though a knight on a white horse never showed up unless I played him myself, Midori was always there.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしが見たことのないものを見て、わたしの知らないことを知っていました。
MESSAGE.EN: She had seen many things I'd never seen, and she knew many things I'd never known.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had seen many things I'd never seen, and she knew many things I'd never known.

MESSAGE.JP: 夢と現実が繋がったんです。
MESSAGE.EN: My dream was linked with reality.
MESSAGE.Translation: My dream was linked with reality.

MESSAGE.JP: こんな素敵なことがあるでしょうか。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the most wonderful thing I'd ever experienced.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the most wonderful thing I'd ever experienced.

MESSAGE.JP: やがてわたし達は大きくなり、学校に通うようになりました。
MESSAGE.EN: A few years later, I had grown old enough to go to elementary school.
MESSAGE.Translation: A few years later, I had grown old enough to go to elementary school.

MESSAGE.JP: それでもわたし達は仲良しでした。
MESSAGE.EN: But we were still as close to each other as ever.
MESSAGE.Translation: But we were still as close to each other as ever.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「お姉ちゃんはいいなあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I'm jealous of you, Onee-chan...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I'm jealous of you, Onee-chan...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「そう？　わたしは美鳥の方が、よっぽどうらやましいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Really? But I'm jealous of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Really? But I'm jealous of you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わたしは読んでいた本から顔をあげて、美鳥に答えました。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered, lifting my head from the book I was reading.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered, lifting my head from the book I was reading.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「どうして？　あたしもお父さんやお母さんと話がしたいんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝How come? I wanna chat with Mama and Papa like you do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝How come? I wanna chat with Mama and Papa like you do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥が両親をはじめ、他の人に見えてないことは分かっていました。
MESSAGE.EN: I knew that, my parents included, nobody else could see Midori.
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew that, my parents included, nobody else could see Midori.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしは両親の前では、ひとりっ子のふりをしていました。
MESSAGE.EN: So I was pretending to be an only child in front of other people.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I was pretending to be an only child in front of other people.

MESSAGE.JP: とても、とても、辛いことでしたけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: That was very, very painful for me.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was very, very painful for me.

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「じゃあ、変わってあげようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Then I'll switch with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Then I'll switch with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あはは、それは無理だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Ahaha, that's impossible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Ahaha, that's impossible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「だって、お姉ちゃんはお姉ちゃんだし。あたしはあたしだもん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Because you are yourself, and I am myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Because you are yourself, and I am myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「…そうだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝...I guess.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝...I guess.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あーあ、あたしも学校に行きたいなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Geez, I really wanna go to school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Geez, I really wanna go to school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「たくさん、友達がいるんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You have lots of friends there, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You have lots of friends there, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: うらやましそうに、言いました。
MESSAGE.EN: She sounded very envious.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sounded very envious.

MESSAGE.JP: ですが、美鳥がそう思うほど、わたしにとって学校は楽しい場所ではありませんでした。
MESSAGE.EN: However, school wasn't as enjoyable for me as Midori might have thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, school wasn't as enjoyable for me as Midori might have thought.

MESSAGE.JP: 学校には、わたしがいる場所はありませんでした。
MESSAGE.EN: The school was not a place where I could be myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: The school was not a place where I could be myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 自分には行かなくちゃいけない所がある。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to go and find where I belonged.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to go and find where I belonged.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな思いは、だんだんと強くなっていきました。
MESSAGE.EN: Gradually that feeling inside me was growing stronger and stronger.
MESSAGE.Translation: Gradually that feeling inside me was growing stronger and stronger.

MESSAGE.JP: もし、そこに行くならば。
MESSAGE.EN: And if I ever discovered the place,
MESSAGE.Translation: And if I ever discovered the place,

MESSAGE.JP: その時は、美鳥と一緒だと。
MESSAGE.EN: I would go there with Midori.
MESSAGE.Translation: I would go there with Midori.

MESSAGE.JP: そう思いました。
MESSAGE.EN: That's what I decided.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's what I decided.

MESSAGE.JP: わたし達は仲良しで、よくおしゃべりをして、同じ本を読みました。
MESSAGE.EN: She and I were close friends; we talked a lot and read books together.
MESSAGE.Translation: She and I were close friends; we talked a lot and read books together.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、いつまでもそうはしていられないことを、わたし達はじきに知ることになるのです。
MESSAGE.EN: But over time I realized that even those days would not last forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: But over time I realized that even those days would not last forever.

MESSAGE.JP: たとえば、こんなことがありました。
MESSAGE.EN: For instance, one time...
MESSAGE.Translation: For instance, one time...

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「ねえ、美鳥はあの雲は何に見える？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Midori, what do you think that cloud looks like?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Midori, what do you think that cloud looks like?❞

MESSAGE.JP: お休みの日、わたし達はふたり並んで、窓から空を眺めていました。
MESSAGE.EN: We were lined up by the window on a holiday, gazing up at the clouds.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were lined up by the window on a holiday, gazing up at the clouds.

MESSAGE.JP: そこに見えるのは澄み渡った青い空、そして、まばらに浮かんでいるのは白い雲です。
MESSAGE.EN: Here and there, white clouds lazily drifted across the deep blue sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: Here and there, white clouds lazily drifted across the deep blue sky.

MESSAGE.JP: 既に雲が水蒸気のかたまりでできていることは知っていました。
MESSAGE.EN: I already knew back then that a cloud was a visible mass of droplets of water.
MESSAGE.Translation: I already knew back then that a cloud was a visible mass of droplets of water.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも、空と雲、青と白の対比はわたしにとって、その事実だけでは説明の付かない不思議な気持ちを抱かせました。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, I couldn't help the mysterious sensation arising from the contrast of the sky and the cloud, the blue and the white.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, I couldn't help the mysterious sensation arising from the contrast of the sky and the cloud, the blue and the white.

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「わたしは、きりんだと思うな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝I think it looks like a giraffe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝I think it looks like a giraffe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わたしは空を見上げては、雲を動物や果物、お菓子に見立てて遊ぶのが好きでした。
MESSAGE.EN: When I looked to the sky, I liked to visualize the clouds as various things, such as animals or fruit.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I looked to the sky, I liked to visualize the clouds as various things, such as animals or fruit.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょうど白い画用紙を青色で塗りつぶして、真ん中だけを猫の形にぽっかりと白く残して遊ぶように、空にいる神様が遊んでいるのではないかと思いました。
MESSAGE.EN: In my imagination, I felt that God must have been painting those things in white on this ever-stretching blue canvas called the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: In my imagination, I felt that God must have been painting those things in white on this ever-stretching blue canvas called the sky.

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「今度はりんごみたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝That one looks like an apple.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝That one looks like an apple.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「…そう、かも知れないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝...Yeah, maybe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝...Yeah, maybe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わたしが楽しそうに話しかけるほど、美鳥の返事は短いものでした。
MESSAGE.EN: The more excited I got about the clouds, the terser her replies grew.
MESSAGE.Translation: The more excited I got about the clouds, the terser her replies grew.

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「美鳥はどう思う？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝What do you think, Midori?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝What do you think, Midori?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 馬の形をした雲と、女の子の形をした雲が近くにあれば、そこからお話を考えてみたいと思いました。
MESSAGE.EN: When I spotted a horse-shaped cloud and a girl-shaped one, I started thinking up a story about them.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I spotted a horse-shaped cloud and a girl-shaped one, I started thinking up a story about them.

MESSAGE.JP: その頃、わたしはお話を読むだけでは飽きたらず、自分でお話を作るようになっていました。
MESSAGE.EN: By that time, I wasn't content with simply reading stories. I was interested in crafting stories on my own.
MESSAGE.Translation: By that time, I wasn't content with simply reading stories. I was interested in crafting stories on my own.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしが考えた登場人物やお話を、美鳥と出会った頃のように、ふたりで演じて遊ぶことができたならば、それはどんなに素敵なことでしょうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I was thinking how wonderful it would be if Midori and I could play characters I had contrived.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was thinking how wonderful it would be if Midori and I could play characters I had contrived.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「…あはは、よく分かんないかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝...Ahaha, I don't know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝...Ahaha, I don't know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「そう？　あの、わたしはね、わたしはね――」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Really? You know, you know, I think that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Really? You know, you know, I think that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: でも、この遊びに美鳥は付き合ってくれないのでした。
MESSAGE.EN: But she didn't seem to show much interest in this little game.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she didn't seem to show much interest in this little game.

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「ねえ、つまらないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Hey, this is boring.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Hey, this is boring.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しばらくして、わたしは美鳥に言ってしまいました。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, unable to stand Midori's listless attitude any longer, I complained to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, unable to stand Midori's listless attitude any longer, I complained to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 確かにわたし達はごっこ遊びをするには、大きくなっていたかも知れません。
MESSAGE.EN: I admit that we should have outgrown such childish games by then..
MESSAGE.Translation: I admit that we should have outgrown such childish games by then..

MESSAGE.JP: でも学校でのわたしには、一緒にそんな遊びをできる友達もなく、美鳥と一緒に遊びたかったのです。
MESSAGE.EN: But I didn't have any school friends to do such things with, so I really wanted to play with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I didn't have any school friends to do such things with, so I really wanted to play with her.

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「美鳥は、あの雲はなんだと思うの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝What do you think that cloud looks like?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝What do you think that cloud looks like?❞

MESSAGE.JP: その日も、空は青く、白い雲がいくつも浮かんでいました。
MESSAGE.EN: On that day also, the sky was blue and spotted with many white clouds.
MESSAGE.Translation: On that day also, the sky was blue and spotted with many white clouds.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「分かんない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I don't know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I don't know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「分かんないってことはないでしょう？　ほら、あれなんて馬みたい。王子さまがいれば、本当に白馬に乗った王子さまだと思わない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Why not? Look, that one seems just like a horse. Don't you think it's like a white horse just waiting for a prince to get on it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Why not? Look, that one seems just like a horse. Don't you think it's like a white horse just waiting for a prince to get on it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「だから――分かんないって言ってるじゃないっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I told you... I don't know!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I told you... I don't know!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 思いもかけない、美鳥の大きな声に思わずわたしは黙ってしまいました。
MESSAGE.EN: She raised her voice so unexpectedly that I fell silent in surprise.
MESSAGE.Translation: She raised her voice so unexpectedly that I fell silent in surprise.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「…ごめん。でもね、本当に分からないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝...Sorry, but I really can't tell.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝...Sorry, but I really can't tell.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それから、静かに美鳥は言いました。
MESSAGE.EN: She then went on in a quiet voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then went on in a quiet voice.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「お姉ちゃんは、雲が色んな形に見えるかもしれないけど…だって、雲は雲じゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I can't see things in the clouds like sis... Clouds are just clouds.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I can't see things in the clouds like sis... Clouds are just clouds.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「青い空に浮かんでいるのは、ただの白いもくもくしたかたまりだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝All I can see in that blue sky is lots of white clumps.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝All I can see in that blue sky is lots of white clumps.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「それが馬に見えたり、猫に見えたり、女の子に見えたりなんて…しないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I can't see any of them as a horse, cat, or a girl...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I can't see any of them as a horse, cat, or a girl...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「お姉ちゃんが、あたしにそうやって訊くたびに、あたしとお姉ちゃんは本当に同じものを見ているのか、とても不安になっちゃうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Every time you ask me something like that, I feel like you and I might be seeing different things, and it worries me a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Every time you ask me something like that, I feel like you and I might be seeing different things, and it worries me a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつもは元気な美鳥の、とても寂しそうな声でした。
MESSAGE.EN: The usually energetic Midori sounded deeply lonely.
MESSAGE.Translation: The usually energetic Midori sounded deeply lonely.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしと美鳥は同じものを見ているはずでした。
MESSAGE.EN: The two of us were looking at the same thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of us were looking at the same thing.

MESSAGE.JP: 同じ空を、同じ世界を見ていると思っていました。
MESSAGE.EN: So we both should have seen the same sky, the same world.
MESSAGE.Translation: So we both should have seen the same sky, the same world.

MESSAGE.JP: いま、わたし達の頭の上に浮かぶ雲が作る輪郭は、わたしにはやっぱり馬に見えるのです。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if she couldn't see it, the outline of the cloud up above us looked like a horse to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if she couldn't see it, the outline of the cloud up above us looked like a horse to me.

MESSAGE.JP: あの部分が頭で、あの部分が首、あそこがちょうど四本の足、というように。
MESSAGE.EN: That bit was the head, that bit the neck, and those things were four legs.
MESSAGE.Translation: That bit was the head, that bit the neck, and those things were four legs.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、美鳥にはそれが見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: But Midori hadn't been able to see it the way I had.
MESSAGE.Translation: But Midori hadn't been able to see it the way I had.

MESSAGE.JP: 同じ雲を見ても、同じようには見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though we looked at exactly the same cloud, what we saw was different.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though we looked at exactly the same cloud, what we saw was different.

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「…でも、ほら。あそこが頭で」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝...But, look, that part is the head, and...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝...But, look, that part is the head, and...❞

MESSAGE.JP: その事実を受け入れることができず、わたしは遥か遠い空を指さして、一生懸命に説明をしました。
MESSAGE.EN: Not able to accept the fact, I pointed at the cloud and painstakingly tried to explain to her how I saw it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not able to accept the fact, I pointed at the cloud and painstakingly tried to explain to her how I saw it.

MESSAGE.JP: 隣では、美鳥がわたしの指す先を見つめています。
MESSAGE.EN: Next to me, Midori was peering at the cloud.
MESSAGE.Translation: Next to me, Midori was peering at the cloud.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしの指がどこを指しているのか、それさえもあやふやなままに。
MESSAGE.EN: But she looked uncertain of where exactly I was even pointing.
MESSAGE.Translation: But she looked uncertain of where exactly I was even pointing.

MESSAGE.JP: そして――。
MESSAGE.EN: And then...
MESSAGE.Translation: And then...

MESSAGE.JP: 『美魚、ひとりでなにを騒いでいるの？』
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Mio, what are you doing? Who are you talking to?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Mio, what are you doing? Who are you talking to?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 帰ってきた母の一言で、わたし達の時間は終わりました。
MESSAGE.EN: My mother's words instantly dragged me back to reality.
MESSAGE.Translation: My mother's words instantly dragged me back to reality.

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「ううん、なんでもないの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Nothing, never mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Nothing, never mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わたしは、自分が見ている世界が自分にしか見えていないことを思い知り、そして美鳥という妹自身がそうであることを思い出したのでした。
MESSAGE.EN: At that moment, I realized that nobody else could ever perceive the world just the way I did, and even my little sister was no exception.
MESSAGE.Translation: At that moment, I realized that nobody else could ever perceive the world just the way I did, and even my little sister was no exception.

MESSAGE.JP: それからも、わたし達はいつも一緒でした。
MESSAGE.EN: After that, Midori and I were together the same as always.
MESSAGE.Translation: After that, Midori and I were together the same as always.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、もうごっこ遊びはまったくしなくなったのです。
MESSAGE.EN: However, one thing had changed: we quit playing make-believe.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, one thing had changed: we quit playing make-believe.

MESSAGE.JP: そして――小学校も高学年になったある日のこと。
MESSAGE.EN: And then, I moved to a higher grade at school.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then, I moved to a higher grade at school.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、わたしの体に大人の徴（しるし）があらわれ始めた頃のことです。
MESSAGE.EN: Around that time, I became aware of changes in my body that marked the beginning of my ascension to adulthood.
MESSAGE.Translation: Around that time, I became aware of changes in my body that marked the beginning of my ascension to adulthood.

MESSAGE.JP: わたしは母に連れられて白い建物の門をくぐりました。
MESSAGE.EN: One day, my mother took me to a white building.
MESSAGE.Translation: One day, my mother took me to a white building.

MESSAGE.JP: そこには、優しい笑顔をしたおじさんやお姉さんが何人もいました。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone there showered me with gentle smiles.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone there showered me with gentle smiles.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼らは優しくわたしに接してくれました。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone I encountered treated me very kindly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone I encountered treated me very kindly.

MESSAGE.JP: 対照的に、母の顔はとても険しいものでした。
MESSAGE.EN: But the look on my mother's face, on the other hand, was very grim.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: But the look on my mother's face, on the other hand, was very grim.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 白髪交じりのおじさんが、わたしに美鳥のことを色々と尋ねます。
MESSAGE.EN: A middle-aged man with graying hair asked me many questions about Midori.
MESSAGE.Translation: A middle-aged man with graying hair asked me many questions about Midori.

MESSAGE.JP: 『美鳥ちゃんは、どんな子なのかな』
MESSAGE.EN: ❝Can you tell me about Midori-chan?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝Can you tell me about Midori-chan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「どうして、美鳥のことを知っているの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Why do you know about her?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Why do you know about her?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 母の前では、隠してきたはずでした。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought I had been keeping Midori a secret from my parents.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought I had been keeping Midori a secret from my parents.

MESSAGE.JP: でも所詮は子供のすることでした。
MESSAGE.EN: But I was still just a child back then.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I was still just a child back then.

MESSAGE.JP: 父も母も、自分たちには見えない誰かとわたしが話していることくらい、とっくに気づいていたのです。
MESSAGE.EN: Both of my parents had, of course, already noticed that I often talked to somebody they couldn't see.
MESSAGE.Translation: Both of my parents had, of course, already noticed that I often talked to somebody they couldn't see.

MESSAGE.JP: 『おじさんもね、美鳥ちゃんに会いたいんだよ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❝I'd like to meet her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝I'd like to meet her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 白い服をきたおじさんはにこにこと笑いました。
MESSAGE.EN: The man in white clothes was positively beaming.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man in white clothes was positively beaming.

MESSAGE.JP: 隣りに立っていたお姉さんも、一緒に笑いました。
MESSAGE.EN: So was the young lady by his side.
MESSAGE.Translation: So was the young lady by his side.

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「えーと、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わたしは嬉しくなりました。
MESSAGE.EN: I was excited.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was excited.

MESSAGE.JP: わたし以外にも、美鳥のことを理解してくれる人がいることが。
MESSAGE.EN: Excited that I had found other people besides me who tried to understand Midori.
MESSAGE.Translation: Excited that I had found other people besides me who tried to understand Midori.

MESSAGE.JP: この優しそうな人なら、美鳥も仲良くなれるんじゃないかな。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛They seem very kind, so they could become good friends with her.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛They seem very kind, so they could become good friends with her.❜

MESSAGE.JP: そう思いました。
MESSAGE.EN: That's what I believed.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's what I believed.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、わたしは素直に話しました。
MESSAGE.EN: So I told them everything.
MESSAGE.Translation: So I told them everything.

MESSAGE.JP: 読んだ本のこと、学校であったこと、楽しかったこと、いやなこと。
MESSAGE.EN: The books I'd read, stuff about school, fun things, the things that bummed me out.
MESSAGE.Translation: The books I'd read, stuff about school, fun things, the things that bummed me out.

MESSAGE.JP: 色んな話を美鳥にすることを。
MESSAGE.EN: Also, all I'd done with Midori.
MESSAGE.Translation: Also, all I'd done with Midori.

MESSAGE.JP: 一緒に遊び、一緒に本を読み、一緒に眠ることを。
MESSAGE.EN: Playing with her, reading with her and sleeping together with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Playing with her, reading with her and sleeping together with her.

MESSAGE.JP: 『そうなんだ。それは良かったね』
MESSAGE.EN: ❝That's awesome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝That's awesome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: わたしは母が聞いていることも構わず、美鳥のことをおじさんにいっぱい話しました。
MESSAGE.EN: Not caring that my mother was also listening, I told them everything about Midori.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not caring that my mother was also listening, I told them everything about Midori.

MESSAGE.JP: 話が終わると、わたしは廊下で待っているように言われました。
MESSAGE.EN: After I was done, the man ushered me out of the room and told me to wait in the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: After I was done, the man ushered me out of the room and told me to wait in the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: ドアの前に立っていると、部屋の中からおじさんと母が話しているのが聞こえてきました。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear him and my mother talking through the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear him and my mother talking through the door.

MESSAGE.JP: 『小さい子にはあることですが、高学年になってまでというのは少し心配ですね』
MESSAGE.EN: ❝This sort of thing often happens with younger children. She should have outgrown it by now though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝This sort of thing often happens with younger children. She should have outgrown it by now though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『学校でも友達がいなくて、…とても心配なんです。治りますでしょうか』
MESSAGE.EN: ❝She doesn't have any friends at school... I'm really worried about her. Do you think she'll be all right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝She doesn't have any friends at school... I'm really worried about her. Do you think she'll be all right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 『心配はいりませんよ。ゆっくりと治療していきましょう』
MESSAGE.EN: ❝You needn't worry. We will cure her slowly but steadily.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝You needn't worry. We will cure her slowly but steadily.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あたし、やだなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I don't wanna meet them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I don't wanna meet them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「でも、とっても優しい人だったよ。きっと美鳥も気に入ると思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝But they were all really kind. I'm sure you'll like them, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝But they were all really kind. I'm sure you'll like them, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「ねえ、お姉ちゃんはあたしがお姉ちゃん以外の人と話をしてもいいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Are you sure you don't mind me talking to other people too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Are you sure you don't mind me talking to other people too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「それは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Um...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Um...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥のことはあたしと美鳥だけの秘密のはずでした。
MESSAGE.EN: Midori was supposed to be a secret only I knew about.
MESSAGE.Translation: Midori was supposed to be a secret only I knew about.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、実際はおじさん達も知っていました。
MESSAGE.EN: However, that mister had already known.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, that mister had already known.

MESSAGE.JP: 両親と違って、美鳥のことを認めてくれる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was sure that, unlike my parents, he would understand Midori.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was sure that, unlike my parents, he would understand Midori.

MESSAGE.JP: 今はまだおじさんには見えないだろうけど、きっと話ができるようになる。
MESSAGE.EN: He couldn't see her yet, but surely some day he would be able to.
MESSAGE.Translation: He couldn't see her yet, but surely some day he would be able to.

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「やっぱり、そっちの方が嬉しいかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Yeah, that would be better after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Yeah, that would be better after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「そう…。でも、なんかやっぱりいやな気がするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Okay... But I still don't really wanna meet him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Okay... But I still don't really wanna meet him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それから、わたしは何度もその建物に母と一緒に通いました。
MESSAGE.EN: My mother took me to the building time and time again.
MESSAGE.Translation: My mother took me to the building time and time again.

MESSAGE.JP: その建物が病院だと分かるのに、さほど時間はかかりませんでした。
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't take me too long to realize that the building was a hospital.
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't take me too long to realize that the building was a hospital.

MESSAGE.JP: おじさん――医師と話をしたり、時々痛い注射をしたり、薬を飲んだりしました。
MESSAGE.EN: The man was a doctor; he had many amiable chats with me, sometimes giving me a shot and some medicine.
MESSAGE.Translation: The man was a doctor; he had many amiable chats with me, sometimes giving me a shot and some medicine.

MESSAGE.JP: 薬を飲むと、決まって少しぼんやりしました。
MESSAGE.EN: The medicine always made me a little spaced out.
MESSAGE.Translation: The medicine always made me a little spaced out.

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥と会える時間が少なくなっていきました。
MESSAGE.EN: Little by little, I saw Midori less and less.
MESSAGE.Translation: Little by little, I saw Midori less and less.

MESSAGE.JP: 毎日が一日おきに、一日おきが三日おきに、三日おきが一週間になりました。
MESSAGE.EN: Every other day, every four days, once a week.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every other day, every four days, once a week.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなわたしの様子に、母は喜んでいるようでした。
MESSAGE.EN: My mother appeared to be glad about that change.
MESSAGE.Translation: My mother appeared to be glad about that change.

MESSAGE.JP: 『美鳥ちゃんに会いたいんだよ』
MESSAGE.EN: ❝I'd like to meet her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ❝I'd like to meet her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 最初に会った時にそう言った医師は、結局美鳥には会おうとはしませんでした。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though the doctor had said that on our first meeting, he ended up making no effort to actually meet her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though the doctor had said that on our first meeting, he ended up making no effort to actually meet her.

MESSAGE.JP: そして…。
MESSAGE.EN: And at the end...
MESSAGE.Translation: And at the end...

MESSAGE.JP: ずっとしゃべり続けていた西園さんが、初めて言葉を詰まらせた。
MESSAGE.EN: After talking for a long time, Nishizono-san suddenly stopped, hesitant to keep going.
MESSAGE.Translation: After talking for a long time, Nishizono-san suddenly stopped, hesitant to keep going.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I found myself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I found myself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「美鳥のいない日々が当たり前のようになっていったんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...used to Midori not being around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...used to Midori not being around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「少しぼんやりする頭で思い返してみると…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The muddled feeling the medicine gave me made me think...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The muddled feeling the medicine gave me made me think...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「やっぱり美鳥なんて妹は、最初からいなかったの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...that perhaps I'd never had a little sister called Midori.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...that perhaps I'd never had a little sister called Midori.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしはずっとひとりっ子だったんだと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'd been an only child all along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'd been an only child all along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それが本当のことのように、思えてきました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I started to accept that as truth.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I started to accept that as truth.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「初めて病院に行ってから、半年ほどしてからでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Then, almost six months since my first hospital visit...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Then, almost six months since my first hospital visit...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「母がわたしに訊きました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝My mother asked me a question.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝My mother asked me a question.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「『美魚ちゃん、美鳥は今どこにいるの』と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝❛Mio-chan, where is Midori right now?❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝❛Mio-chan, where is Midori right now?❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…美鳥とは誰のことなのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...But, at that moment,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...But, at that moment,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「その時のわたしには思い出せませんでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I couldn't remember who this Midori person was.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I couldn't remember who this Midori person was.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「だから、わたしは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝So I answered...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝So I answered...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「『そんな子は知らない』と…答えたんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝❛I don't know such a person.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝❛I don't know such a person.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「その言葉を聞いた母は久しぶりに嬉しそうな顔を見せました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That reply brought a happy smile to my mother's face for the first time after so long.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That reply brought a happy smile to my mother's face for the first time after so long.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それから、しばらくしてわたしは病院に行くこともなくなりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Soon after, I even stopped going to the hospital.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Soon after, I even stopped going to the hospital.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そのまま、わたしは美鳥のことを忘れていました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Like that, I had completely forgotten Midori.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Like that, I had completely forgotten Midori.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あの歌に出会うまでは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Until I came across that poem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Until I came across that poem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 白鳥は哀しからずや空の青
MESSAGE.EN: Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad?
MESSAGE.Translation: Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad?

MESSAGE.JP: $dうみのあをにも染まず
MESSAGE.EN: $dLeft alone, ne'er touched
MESSAGE.Translation: $dLeft alone, ne'er touched

MESSAGE.JP: $dただよふ
MESSAGE.EN: $dby the blue of yonder sky, or the blue of hither sea.
MESSAGE.Translation: $dby the blue of yonder sky, or the blue of hither sea.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「学校の授業でその歌を教わった時、わたしはそのまま気を失いました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝When I read that poem in class, I fainted.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝When I read that poem in class, I fainted.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そして、保健室で目を覚ましたわたしは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And when I came around in the school infirmary...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And when I came around in the school infirmary...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「美鳥のことを思い出しました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I remembered Midori.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I remembered Midori.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それは、忘れてしまった時と同じくらい唐突なできごとでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It happened as abruptly as when I'd forgotten her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It happened as abruptly as when I'd forgotten her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「海と空のはざまでひとりぼっちに漂う白鳥（しらとり）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝A white bird floating alone between the sea and sky.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝A white bird floating alone between the sea and sky.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それが美鳥のことでなく、他の誰だと言うのでしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I couldn't help picturing Midori when I read that poem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I couldn't help picturing Midori when I read that poem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ひとり保健室のベッドで目覚めたわたしはその時、確かに羽の音を聞きました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Just as I woke up alone in the room, I was certain I heard the flapping of wings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Just as I woke up alone in the room, I was certain I heard the flapping of wings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「一羽の鳥が、わたしのすぐ隣から飛び立つ音を聞いたのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It was the sound of a bird taking off from the ground right beside me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It was the sound of a bird taking off from the ground right beside me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「その姿はわたしには見えませんでしたが、きっと大きな白い翼を持った鳥であったに違いありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I couldn't see its figure, but it must have been a white bird with big wings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I couldn't see its figure, but it must have been a white bird with big wings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしは、わたしの大切な一部を失ったことを知りました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And I realized I had lost something important.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And I realized I had lost something important.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして、西園さんからは影が消えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san had lost her shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san had lost her shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「その日から、わたしは日傘を手放せなくなりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Since that day, I started carrying the parasol.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Since that day, I started carrying the parasol.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「きっと、美鳥はわたしのことを恨んでいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It must have been Midori's punishment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It must have been Midori's punishment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あの子のことを忘れてしまった、わたしを許さないでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝She wouldn't forgive me for forgetting her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝She wouldn't forgive me for forgetting her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いつか、きっとわたしの前に現れる日が来ると思いました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And I knew for sure that one day we would meet again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And I knew for sure that one day we would meet again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしはその日が来ることを…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Actually, I'd been waiting...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Actually, I'd been waiting...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ずっと待っていました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝For the day to come.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝For the day to come.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしは美鳥に会って、そして――」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And I'd decided that if I met her again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And I'd decided that if I met her again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あの子の代わりになりたかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I would switch places with her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I would switch places with her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「何ものにも染まらない白鳥（しらとり）になりたかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I wanted to be a white bird unstained by anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I wanted to be a white bird unstained by anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「空と海の間にある場所こそが、わたしが子供の頃から憧れていた場所なんだと分かりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And I understood where it was I had always longed to be. It was that place between the sky and the sea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And I understood where it was I had always longed to be. It was that place between the sky and the sea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The reason I was waiting for her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The reason I was waiting for her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「美鳥にあんな酷いことをしたのに、その罪をつぐなうためではなく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...is not because I wanted to pay for the terrible thing I'd done to her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...is not because I wanted to pay for the terrible thing I'd done to her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしがそこに行きたいがために、あの子がふたたびわたしの前に姿を見せるのをずっと待ち続けたのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's just because I wanted to reach that place I'd so long been dreaming of.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's just because I wanted to reach that place I'd so long been dreaming of.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その言葉を最後に、西園さんは長く息を吐き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: Finally having finished speaking, she sighed deeply.
MESSAGE.Translation: Finally having finished speaking, she sighed deeply.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お話は以上です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Now, that's the whole of the story.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Now, that's the whole of the story.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どうか、わたしの入った棺の蓋を閉じてください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Please close the lid of my coffin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Please close the lid of my coffin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少女は棺の中の世界を選んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: This girl had chosen the world inside the coffin.
MESSAGE.Translation: This girl had chosen the world inside the coffin.

MESSAGE.JP: 苦痛だらけの現実を捨て、棺の中の世界を望んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was longing to run away from this anguish-filled world and move into the closed-off world inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was longing to run away from this anguish-filled world and move into the closed-off world inside.

MESSAGE.JP: そこは、ひとりきりの世界。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a world for one person alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a world for one person alone.

MESSAGE.JP: でも。
MESSAGE.EN: But.
MESSAGE.Translation: But.

MESSAGE.JP: その棺の蓋を閉じることができるのは、誰か他の人の手だ。
MESSAGE.EN: She couldn't close the lid of the coffin herself; she needed somebody else's hands to do that.
MESSAGE.Translation: She couldn't close the lid of the coffin herself; she needed somebody else's hands to do that.

MESSAGE.JP: 蓋は、外からしか閉じられない。
MESSAGE.EN: The lid couldn't be closed from the inside.
MESSAGE.Translation: The lid couldn't be closed from the inside.

MESSAGE.JP: 死者が棺の蓋を閉じることなど、できはしないのだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because the body inside a coffin can no longer move.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because the body inside a coffin can no longer move.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あなたが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あとは、直枝さんがわたしのことを忘れてくれれば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You are the only one left who hasn't forgotten me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You are the only one left who hasn't forgotten me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしは、あの場所に行けるんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝After you do, I will be able to reach that place.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝After you do, I will be able to reach that place.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「白鳥は哀しからずや空の青　うみのあをにも染まず　ただよふ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad? Left alone, ne'er touched by the blue of yonder sky, or the blue of hither sea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad? Left alone, ne'er touched by the blue of yonder sky, or the blue of hither sea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの口から、その歌を聞くのはもう何度目だろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know how many times I've heard her recite the poem so far.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know how many times I've heard her recite the poem so far.

MESSAGE.JP: やっと分かった。
MESSAGE.EN: But I finally realized
MESSAGE.Translation: But I finally realized

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんがどんな気持ちで、この歌を口にしていたのか。
MESSAGE.EN: what it is she feels when she recites it.
MESSAGE.Translation: what it is she feels when she recites it.

MESSAGE.JP: 贖罪。
MESSAGE.EN: Atonement.
MESSAGE.Translation: Atonement.

MESSAGE.JP: 罪業。
MESSAGE.EN: Sin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sin.

MESSAGE.JP: 寂寞。
MESSAGE.EN: Loneliness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Loneliness.

MESSAGE.JP: 呪縛。
MESSAGE.EN: Restraint.
MESSAGE.Translation: Restraint.

MESSAGE.JP: 永遠。
MESSAGE.EN: Eternity.
MESSAGE.Translation: Eternity.

MESSAGE.JP: 別離。
MESSAGE.EN: Separation.
MESSAGE.Translation: Separation.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたし、ずっと孤独になりたかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I've always wished to be alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I've always wished to be alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 透きとおる声だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice was unshaken.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice was unshaken.

MESSAGE.JP: 痛みも悲しみも、すべてはその向こう側にあると思える声だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the kind of voice that was made by one who had transcended anguish and sorrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the kind of voice that was made by one who had transcended anguish and sorrow.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「美鳥のことを思い出した後、わたしはそれだけを願っていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's the only thing that's been on my mind ever since I recalled Midori.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's the only thing that's been on my mind ever since I recalled Midori.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「永遠の空をなす大気」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Air composes this eternal sky.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Air composes this eternal sky.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「無限の海をなす水」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Water comprises this endless sea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Water comprises this endless sea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「その透明の集合のはざまで漂う白鳥（しらとり）のように孤独でありたいと、ずっと思っていました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I always thought I wanted to be alone like a white bird floating in that unseen boundary.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I always thought I wanted to be alone like a white bird floating in that unseen boundary.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「何も失わない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Losing nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Losing nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「大切なことは決して、忘れない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Never forgetting anything precious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Never forgetting anything precious.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしがわたしであること」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Only being myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Only being myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「永遠に、わたしであり続けること」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Forever remaining myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Forever remaining myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「何者にも犯されず、永遠であること」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Forever untouched by anyone else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Forever untouched by anyone else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「その方法は唯一、孤独であることなんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The only way to make it come true is to be alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The only way to make it come true is to be alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは違うよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's not!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's not!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は叫ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: I yelled out.
MESSAGE.Translation: I yelled out.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕が、ここにいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I am here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I am here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自分を指さす。
MESSAGE.EN: I pointed at myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pointed at myself.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そして――」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんに手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: I reached out toward her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I reached out toward her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんが、ここにいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You are here, Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You are here, Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕らは決して、交わらない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We never cross each other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We never cross each other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「決して、溶け合わない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And we never blend into each other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And we never blend into each other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どんなに僕が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No matter...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No matter...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕が……」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...how much......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...how much......❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕が…」
`理樹@「僕が西園さんのことが、好きだとしても」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...love you, Nishizono-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...love you, Nishizono-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 叫ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: I kept yelling.
MESSAGE.Translation: I kept yelling.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は、
MESSAGE.EN: So I could
MESSAGE.Translation: So I could

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が、
MESSAGE.EN: deliver
MESSAGE.Translation: deliver

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の、
MESSAGE.EN: my feelings
MESSAGE.Translation: my feelings

MESSAGE.JP: 気持ちを。
MESSAGE.EN: to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「好きだとしても」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No matter how much I love you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No matter how much I love you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの手を握る。
MESSAGE.EN: I caught hold of her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I caught hold of her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに、ここにいる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was definitely right here.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was definitely right here.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の手を西園さんは、握り返す。
MESSAGE.EN: Her hand clasped mine in return.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her hand clasped mine in return.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕らはひとりぼっちなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All of us are alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All of us are alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんが望むまでもなく、僕らは孤独なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if we wished it were otherwise, every one of us has always been alone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if we wished it were otherwise, every one of us has always been alone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: だから。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は西園さんを好きになる。
MESSAGE.EN: I've come to love you, Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I've come to love you, Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: だから。
MESSAGE.EN: That's why
MESSAGE.Translation: That's why

MESSAGE.JP: 人は人を好きになるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: people come to love other people.
MESSAGE.Translation: people come to love other people.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が熱くなればなるほど、西園さんの言葉は静かに響く。
MESSAGE.EN: The more passionate my words became, the quieter her voice sounded to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The more passionate my words became, the quieter her voice sounded to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしがここに残ったら、美鳥はどうなりますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If I were to stay in this world, what do you think would happen to Midori?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If I were to stay in this world, what do you think would happen to Midori?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言葉を突きつけてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She fired the question at me like an arrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: She fired the question at me like an arrow.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あの子は、わたしと違う。この世界で生きることを望んでいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝She's different from me. She has always wished to live here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝She's different from me. She has always wished to live here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたし達の願いは表裏で一致してるんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Our wishes are linked like two sides of a coin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Our wishes are linked like two sides of a coin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん、あなたがわたしのことを憶えていようとするならば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If you keep remembering me,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If you keep remembering me,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「美鳥はふたたび忘れられてしまいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝she'll be forgotten yet again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝she'll be forgotten yet again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしは、それを許さない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I won't let that happen.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I won't let that happen.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが戻ってきたら、美鳥はどうなるのか。
MESSAGE.EN: I had not thought about
MESSAGE.Translation: I had not thought about

MESSAGE.JP: 考えもしなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: what would become of her when Nishizono-san was back.
MESSAGE.Translation: what would become of her when Nishizono-san was back.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりは並列して存在できない。
MESSAGE.EN: The two girls cannot exist at the same time.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two girls cannot exist at the same time.

MESSAGE.JP: 子供の頃とは違う。
MESSAGE.EN: They were no longer children.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were no longer children.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの影を得た美鳥は、西園さんにしか見えない存在には戻れない。
MESSAGE.EN: Having obtained Nishizono-san's shadow, Midori can no longer be someone whom only Nishizono-san can see.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having obtained Nishizono-san's shadow, Midori can no longer be someone whom only Nishizono-san can see.

MESSAGE.JP: どちらかがいれば、どちらかが消える。
MESSAGE.EN: For one to live here, the other has to fade away.
MESSAGE.Translation: For one to live here, the other has to fade away.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が美鳥を選べば、美魚が。
MESSAGE.EN: If I choose Midori, it will be Mio.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I choose Midori, it will be Mio.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が美魚を選び抜けば、美鳥は…。
MESSAGE.EN: If I pick Mio, Midori has to...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I pick Mio, Midori has to...

MESSAGE.JP: その悪戯な笑みを思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: That impish grin Midori had shot at me flashed across my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: That impish grin Midori had shot at me flashed across my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園美…。
MESSAGE.EN: Mi――
MESSAGE.Translation: Mi――

MESSAGE.JP: それは、僕の最後の迷いだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I hesitated one last time before I made my final decision.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hesitated one last time before I made my final decision.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「さようなら、直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Good-bye, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Good-bye, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばたん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Slam*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Slam*.

MESSAGE.JP: 蓋が落ちる重い音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard the heavy sound of the coffin lid closing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard the heavy sound of the coffin lid closing.

MESSAGE.JP: その瞬間。
MESSAGE.EN: At that very instant,
MESSAGE.Translation: At that very instant,

MESSAGE.JP: 白い鳥が空に在った。
MESSAGE.EN: there was a white bird flying into the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: there was a white bird flying into the sky.

MESSAGE.JP: 大きな翼を広げた鳥は水平線に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: The bird, its large wings outspread, was heading to the horizon.
MESSAGE.Translation: The bird, its large wings outspread, was heading to the horizon.

MESSAGE.JP: あれは――西園さん、だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That must have been―― Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: That must have been―― Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 陸から、海へ。
MESSAGE.EN: From the land, to the sea.
MESSAGE.Translation: From the land, to the sea.

MESSAGE.JP: 浜から、空へ。
MESSAGE.EN: From the beach, to the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: From the beach, to the sky.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は見送るしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: All I could do was just watch her departure.
MESSAGE.Translation: All I could do was just watch her departure.

MESSAGE.JP: 小さくなっていく白い姿を。
MESSAGE.EN: The white figure was getting smaller and smaller.
MESSAGE.Translation: The white figure was getting smaller and smaller.

MESSAGE.JP: 海に溶けず、空になじまず、孤独に漂う白を。
MESSAGE.EN: Neither blending into the sea nor mixing with the sky, but merely flying in solitude.
MESSAGE.Translation: Neither blending into the sea nor mixing with the sky, but merely flying in solitude.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、僕は天を仰いでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I found myself gazing upward.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found myself gazing upward.

MESSAGE.JP: 青い空はどこまでも高く、続いている。
MESSAGE.EN: The azure sky was stretching high and wide.
MESSAGE.Translation: The azure sky was stretching high and wide.

MESSAGE.JP: 『青い』空なんて、本当はどこにもないことを僕は知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: I knew there was no such thing as the ❛blue sky.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew there was no such thing as the ❛blue sky.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 透明の連なりが『青』を生みだす。
MESSAGE.EN: What produced that ❛blue❜ was a layer after layer of transparent clarity.
MESSAGE.Translation: What produced that ❛blue❜ was a layer after layer of transparent clarity.

MESSAGE.JP: ない、ものに僕は心を動かされるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My mind also was moved by something unseeable.
MESSAGE.Translation: My mind also was moved by something unseeable.

MESSAGE.JP: ない、ものに僕は振り回されるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Something unseeable coiled me around its finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something unseeable coiled me around its finger.

MESSAGE.JP: 記憶、過去、想い出。
MESSAGE.EN: My memories, my past, my experiences...
MESSAGE.Translation: My memories, my past, my experiences...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の頭の中にしかない、もの。
MESSAGE.EN: Those things were only in my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those things were only in my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、その連なりはこの『青』のように、僕の心を揺り動かす。
MESSAGE.EN: But an endless sequence of them affected my heart just like this ❛blue.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: But an endless sequence of them affected my heart just like this ❛blue.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに、それらは曖昧なものかも知れない。
MESSAGE.EN: They might indeed be ambiguous.
MESSAGE.Translation: They might indeed be ambiguous.

MESSAGE.JP: 言葉ひとつに惑わされ、僕は容易に迷ってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: A single word might have been enough to confound me.
MESSAGE.Translation: A single word might have been enough to confound me.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕には何もない。
MESSAGE.EN: I also had nothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I also had nothing.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は何も持たない。
MESSAGE.EN: I also had no one.
MESSAGE.Translation: I also had no one.

MESSAGE.JP: 『何もない』は――。
MESSAGE.EN: Because...
MESSAGE.Translation: Because...

MESSAGE.JP: どうしようもなく、綺麗なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Nothing❜ was the most beautiful thing to possess.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Nothing❜ was the most beautiful thing to possess.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕には『何もない』から。
MESSAGE.EN: Because I also had ❛nothing.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Because I also had ❛nothing.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は『青』になる。
MESSAGE.EN: I would be ❛blue.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: I would be ❛blue.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『青』と『白』は、決して混じらない。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Blue❜ and ❛white❜ never mixed with each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Blue❜ and ❛white❜ never mixed with each other.

MESSAGE.JP: 混じらないから、美しい。
MESSAGE.EN: But that was exactly where their beauty lay.
MESSAGE.Translation: But that was exactly where their beauty lay.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らは――。
MESSAGE.EN: We were...
MESSAGE.Translation: We were...

MESSAGE.JP: あれ？
MESSAGE.EN: Huh?
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh?

MESSAGE.JP: どうして、僕は泣いているのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: How come I was crying?
MESSAGE.Translation: How come I was crying?

MESSAGE.JP: 悲しいことが、あったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah... it was because something sad had just happened.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah... it was because something sad had just happened.

MESSAGE.JP: 涙が頬を伝う。
MESSAGE.EN: One tear after another came rolling out of my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: One tear after another came rolling out of my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: ひと筋の雫が垂れるたび、僕の中から何かが流れ出していく。
MESSAGE.EN: But with each teardrop, something else was also leaving me.
MESSAGE.Translation: But with each teardrop, something else was also leaving me.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、記憶。
MESSAGE.EN: Some were parts of my memory.
MESSAGE.Translation: Some were parts of my memory.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、過去。
MESSAGE.EN: Some were parts of my past.
MESSAGE.Translation: Some were parts of my past.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、想い出。
MESSAGE.EN: Some were parts of my experiences.
MESSAGE.Translation: Some were parts of my experiences.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕だけが知っている西園さんがいたこと。
MESSAGE.EN: Some were of the Nishizono-san only I knew.
MESSAGE.Translation: Some were of the Nishizono-san only I knew.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が涙を流すたび、僕は忘れていくだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: The more teardrops rolled down my face, the deeper I would fall into oblivion.
MESSAGE.Translation: The more teardrops rolled down my face, the deeper I would fall into oblivion.

MESSAGE.JP: そして。
MESSAGE.EN: And then.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは彼女が望んだ場所で、彼女が望んだ『永遠』を手に入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san would reach ❛eternity❜ at the place where she's been longing to go.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san would reach ❛eternity❜ at the place where she's been longing to go.

MESSAGE.JP: ダメだ。
MESSAGE.EN: No.
MESSAGE.Translation: No.

MESSAGE.JP: 忘れたら、ダメだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to keep remembering her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to keep remembering her.

MESSAGE.JP: 泣いたら、ダメだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to stop crying.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to stop crying.

MESSAGE.JP: このまま涙が枯れ果てれば――。
MESSAGE.EN: If I were to let out every last one of my tears here...
MESSAGE.Translation: If I were to let out every last one of my tears here...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は自分がなぜここにいたかも思い出せないまま、寮に戻ることだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I was certain I would end up returning to the dorm, having even forgotten why I had been here.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was certain I would end up returning to the dorm, having even forgotten why I had been here.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、明日からは元通りの生活が始まる。
MESSAGE.EN: And then everything would return to normal.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then everything would return to normal.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介や鈴、真人に謙吾たちとの騒々しい毎日が。
MESSAGE.EN: Being surrounded by Kyousuke, Rin, Masato and Kengo every day.
MESSAGE.Translation: Being surrounded by Kyousuke, Rin, Masato and Kengo every day.

MESSAGE.JP: そこには『西園さん』もいる。
MESSAGE.EN: And, of course, ❛Nishizono-san❜ as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: And, of course, ❛Nishizono-san❜ as well.

MESSAGE.JP: クラスに溶け込み、皆から好かれ、太陽の下で走り回る。
MESSAGE.EN: Everybody would know her as an amiable and spirited girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everybody would know her as an amiable and spirited girl.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園美魚、が。
MESSAGE.EN: Everybody would believe that she was Mio Nishizono.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everybody would believe that she was Mio Nishizono.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はそれを違和感なく受け入れるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: And, of course, so would I.
MESSAGE.Translation: And, of course, so would I.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園美魚、のことを忘れて。
MESSAGE.EN: I would forget Mio Nishizono,
MESSAGE.Translation: I would forget Mio Nishizono,

MESSAGE.JP: 世界は秩序を取り戻す。
MESSAGE.EN: and then the world would regain its order
MESSAGE.Translation: and then the world would regain its order

MESSAGE.JP: 遡って過去は作られ、現在が構築される。
MESSAGE.EN: by rewriting the past and restructuring the present.
MESSAGE.Translation: by rewriting the past and restructuring the present.

MESSAGE.JP: 変わらない――。
MESSAGE.EN: Everything would go on――
