MESSAGE.Translation: Everything would go on――

MESSAGE.JP: 何も変わらない毎日が続いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: ――as if nothing had happened.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――as if nothing had happened.

MESSAGE.JP: 涙で視界が滲む。
MESSAGE.EN: Tears blurred my sight.
MESSAGE.Translation: Tears blurred my sight.

MESSAGE.JP: 目に映るもの、すべてが曖昧になっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't see anything clearly through them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't see anything clearly through them.

MESSAGE.JP: 空が遠ざかっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: The sky was getting farther and farther from me.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sky was getting farther and farther from me.

MESSAGE.JP: 青は色を失い、透明に戻っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: The blue was losing its color and fading back to that transparent clarity.
MESSAGE.Translation: The blue was losing its color and fading back to that transparent clarity.

MESSAGE.JP: 涙は止めようもなく流れる。
MESSAGE.EN: The tears just kept overflowing against my will.
MESSAGE.Translation: The tears just kept overflowing against my will.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は声もなく、泣いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Without even gasping for breath, I simply wept.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without even gasping for breath, I simply wept.

MESSAGE.JP: ぴろぴろぴろぴろぴろ。
MESSAGE.EN: Ring-ring-ring.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ring-ring-ring.

MESSAGE.JP: 場違いな音が、突然に鳴り響いた。
MESSAGE.EN: All of a sudden, an out-of-place sound blared in my ears.
MESSAGE.Translation: All of a sudden, an out-of-place sound blared in my ears.

MESSAGE.JP: その音に僕は我を取り戻す。
MESSAGE.EN: The unexpected noise made me regain myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: The unexpected noise made me regain myself.

MESSAGE.JP: …何の音だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...What was that sound?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...What was that sound?

MESSAGE.JP: その音が鳴るのがあと数秒遅かったら、僕の涙は枯れ果てていた。
MESSAGE.EN: If I hadn't heard it at that very instant, I would have run out of tears.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I hadn't heard it at that very instant, I would have run out of tears.

MESSAGE.JP: まさに絶妙のタイミングだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was truly divine timing.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was truly divine timing.

MESSAGE.JP: 音は僕の胸元からしている。
MESSAGE.EN: That sound was coming from around my breast pocket.
MESSAGE.Translation: That sound was coming from around my breast pocket.

MESSAGE.JP: 携帯の着信音だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the ringtone of my cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the ringtone of my cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: 『西園美魚』
MESSAGE.EN: [Mio Nishizono]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Mio Nishizono]

MESSAGE.JP: ディスプレイには、そう表示されている。
MESSAGE.EN: The text was being displayed on the screen.
MESSAGE.Translation: The text was being displayed on the screen.

MESSAGE.JP: 慌てて、通話ボタンを押した。
MESSAGE.EN: I immediately pressed the talk button.
MESSAGE.Translation: I immediately pressed the talk button.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『やっほー。理樹くーん、元気ぃ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[Yahhoo. Riki-kun, how's it going?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[Yahhoo. Riki-kun, how's it going?]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…美鳥」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Midori.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Midori.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は掠れた声を絞り出す。
MESSAGE.EN: My voice cracked.
MESSAGE.Translation: My voice cracked.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『おっ、まだ覚えてるんだ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[Oh, you still remember.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[Oh, you still remember.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんとか、ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah, sort of.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah, sort of.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『そう…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[Got it...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[Got it...]

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『泣いていたんだね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[You were crying, weren't you?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[You were crying, weren't you?]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『馬鹿っ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[You BLOCKHEAD!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[You BLOCKHEAD!]

MESSAGE.JP: きーん、と大声が耳元に響く。
MESSAGE.EN: She shouted out so loud that all I could hear in my ear for the next couple seconds was a shrill echo.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shouted out so loud that all I could hear in my ear for the next couple seconds was a shrill echo.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…怒鳴らないでよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Why would you shout like that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Why would you shout like that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『怒りたくもなるよっ。そんなこと、してる場合じゃないでしょう』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[How could I not? Crying isn't what you're supposed to be doing right now, is it?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[How could I not? Crying isn't what you're supposed to be doing right now, is it?]

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『泣いてないで、やるべきことがあるんでしょうっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[You know there's something more important you have to do!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[You know there's something more important you have to do!]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…分かってる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... I know.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... I know.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『お姉ちゃん…のところに行かなきゃ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[You have to go... to where Sis is.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[You have to go... to where Sis is.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ううん、違うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, that's wrong.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, that's wrong.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「行くんじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That won't be enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That won't be enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんを、連れ戻すんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What I must do is bring her back❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What I must do is bring her back❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「この世界に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝to this world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝to this world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『そう、だったね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[That's... how it is.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[That's... how it is.]

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『じゃあ、お別れだね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[Then, it's time we say our farewells.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[Then, it's time we say our farewells.]

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『少しの間だったけど、楽しかったよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[It was only for a few weeks, but I had a lot of fun with you.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[It was only for a few weeks, but I had a lot of fun with you.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「美鳥」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Midori.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Midori.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「君は、どうなるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's going to happen to you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's going to happen to you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『さあ、どうなるんだろうね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[Who knows?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[Who knows?]

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『初めてのことだから、さすがに分かんないよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[I've never done this before.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[I've never done this before.]

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『もう理樹君に会えなくなるのは、間違いないね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[At least, I won't be able to see you again.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[At least, I won't be able to see you again.]

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『ちょっと…寂しいかな』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[I'm going to... miss you a little.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[I'm going to... miss you a little.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『本当に理樹君はお人好しだね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[You really are too kind, Riki-kun.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[You really are too kind, Riki-kun.]

MESSAGE.JP: 耳元のスピーカーは、陽気な美鳥の声を伝えてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her cheerful voice flowed through the speaker.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her cheerful voice flowed through the speaker.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『優しいのはいいことだけど』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[I don't think being kind is a bad thing.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[I don't think being kind is a bad thing.]

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『その優しさはきっと、優柔不断って言うんじゃないかな』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[But I would characterize the kindness you're displaying right now as indecisiveness.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[But I would characterize the kindness you're displaying right now as indecisiveness.]

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『それじゃあ、いつまで経っても手に入れられないこともあるよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[You should know there are things out there that you just can't get, unless you really commit yourself.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[You should know there are things out there that you just can't get, unless you really commit yourself.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「忘れないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I won't forget you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I won't forget you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その言葉に意志を込める。
MESSAGE.EN: I spoke as strongly as I could,
MESSAGE.Translation: I spoke as strongly as I could,

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は言葉に宿る力を信じる。
MESSAGE.EN: believing in the power that resides within words.
MESSAGE.Translation: believing in the power that resides within words.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は君にずっと邪魔されても、西園さんのことを忘れなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No matter how much you were trying to make me forget Nishizono-san, I didn't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No matter how much you were trying to make me forget Nishizono-san, I didn't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから、今度はずっと君のことを憶えている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So trust in me when I promise I will remember you forever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So trust in me when I promise I will remember you forever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『あはは、随分と勝手な言い草だよね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[Ahaha, you can be such an unreasonably selfish guy.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[Ahaha, you can be such an unreasonably selfish guy.]

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『でも…だから好きだよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[But... that's why I like you,]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[But... that's why I like you,]

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『理樹君』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[Riki-kun.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[Riki-kun.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕は、行くよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『うん、いって』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[Yes, go.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[Yes, go.]

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@『理樹君は、あたしたちの“あを”なんだからっ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@[Because you will have to be our ❛blue.❜]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@[Because you will have to be our ❛blue.❜]

MESSAGE.JP: その言葉を最後に、電話は切られた。
MESSAGE.EN: Those were her last words before she hung up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those were her last words before she hung up.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の耳に美鳥の声が残る。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice was still echoing in my ear.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice was still echoing in my ear.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は『あを』だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Like she had said,
MESSAGE.Translation: Like she had said,

MESSAGE.JP: 透明な僕は、青になる。
MESSAGE.EN: I would have to be the ❛blue❜ for them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I would have to be the ❛blue❜ for them.

MESSAGE.JP: いかなきゃ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to go.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to go.

MESSAGE.JP: 行こう。
MESSAGE.EN: And then,
MESSAGE.Translation: And then,

MESSAGE.JP: そして、生きよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to live.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to live.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さーんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の大声に応えはない。
MESSAGE.EN: No answer came back.
MESSAGE.Translation: No answer came back.

MESSAGE.JP: 見上げる空は青く、目の前に広がる海は青い。
MESSAGE.EN: The sky and the sea were both blue.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sky and the sea were both blue.

MESSAGE.JP: 無限の空間に、僕の声は吸い込まれていく。
MESSAGE.EN: My voice was absorbed into this immeasurable space.
MESSAGE.Translation: My voice was absorbed into this immeasurable space.

MESSAGE.JP: 声はすぐに消え、後には何も残らない。
MESSAGE.EN: Any sounds quickly vanished in its vastness, leaving nothing behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Any sounds quickly vanished in its vastness, leaving nothing behind.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは、この無限の先にいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san was beyond this great expanse.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san was beyond this great expanse.

MESSAGE.JP: 考えるよりも先に、体が動く。
MESSAGE.EN: Before I could think about it, my body was already moving.
MESSAGE.Translation: Before I could think about it, my body was already moving.

MESSAGE.JP: 夏には早い季節。
MESSAGE.EN: The summer was still far,
MESSAGE.Translation: The summer was still far,

MESSAGE.JP: まだ海の水は冷たい。
MESSAGE.EN: hence the sea water was still freezing cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: hence the sea water was still freezing cold.

MESSAGE.JP: 自殺行為だ、と冷静な僕が叫ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: The sensible part of me was warning me that I could die.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sensible part of me was warning me that I could die.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、僕はその僕の声には耳を貸さない。
MESSAGE.EN: But I chose not to listen to that voice of reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I chose not to listen to that voice of reason.

MESSAGE.JP: 服を脱ぐ手間すら惜しみ、僕は海に飛び込む。
MESSAGE.EN: Without even taking off any of my clothes, I threw myself into the sea.
MESSAGE.Translation: Without even taking off any of my clothes, I threw myself into the sea.

MESSAGE.JP: 途端に、塩辛い水が鼻に入る。
MESSAGE.EN: At once, salty water shot up my nose.
MESSAGE.Translation: At once, salty water shot up my nose.

MESSAGE.JP: つん、と鼻の奥が痛い。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt painful in my nostrils.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt painful in my nostrils.

MESSAGE.JP: 前に。
MESSAGE.EN: Forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: Forward.

MESSAGE.JP: 少しでも、前に。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if just a little, I had to move forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if just a little, I had to move forward.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとつ、水を掻く。
MESSAGE.EN: One stroke.
MESSAGE.Translation: One stroke.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたつ、水を掻く。
MESSAGE.EN: Two strokes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Two strokes.

MESSAGE.JP: 行く手を遮る水は重い。
MESSAGE.EN: The water blocking my path felt thick and heavy.
MESSAGE.Translation: The water blocking my path felt thick and heavy.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも、僕は目指す。
MESSAGE.EN: Even then, I advanced toward it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even then, I advanced toward it.

MESSAGE.JP: 水平線のはざまを。
MESSAGE.EN: That place between the sky and the sea.
MESSAGE.Translation: That place between the sky and the sea.

MESSAGE.JP: まるで初めからそこにいたように、何ものにも染まらずにただよう白鳥に手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: I reached out my hand toward that bird, soaring above in its white, unstained by anything else.
MESSAGE.Translation: I reached out my hand toward that bird, soaring above in its white, unstained by anything else.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が、あを。
MESSAGE.EN: I was the blue.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was the blue.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが、白鳥。
MESSAGE.EN: And she was the white bird.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she was the white bird.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんはどこへも行く必要なんてないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no need for her to leave for anywhere else at all,
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no need for her to leave for anywhere else at all,

MESSAGE.JP: 最初から、あおの中にいたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: because all along, she had been there within the blue.
MESSAGE.Translation: because all along, she had been there within the blue.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らは決して交わることのない色をしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Our colors could not blend into each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our colors could not blend into each other.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らは互いに染まらない。
MESSAGE.EN: Our colors could not change each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our colors could not change each other.

MESSAGE.JP: それを、孤独と呼ぶのなら。
MESSAGE.EN: If she called that loneliness,
MESSAGE.Translation: If she called that loneliness,

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らは、最初から孤独だ。
MESSAGE.EN: all of us were alone since birth.
MESSAGE.Translation: all of us were alone since birth.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、西園さん。
MESSAGE.EN: So, Nishizono-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: So, Nishizono-san...

MESSAGE.JP: 待っていて。
MESSAGE.EN: Wait for me there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait for me there.

MESSAGE.JP: 君の望む場所は、そんなところじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: Where you are now isn't where you've been longing to be.
MESSAGE.Translation: Where you are now isn't where you've been longing to be.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が――。
MESSAGE.EN: I am going to make you realize――
MESSAGE.Translation: I am going to make you realize――

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が君の望む場所なんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ――that the place you have wished to reach is inside my heart.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――that the place you have wished to reach is inside my heart.

MESSAGE.JP: 後先考えずに飛び込んだ僕に海は容赦なく襲いかかってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Waves beat on me without mercy, trying to keep me from swimming forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: Waves beat on me without mercy, trying to keep me from swimming forward.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも僕は目指す。
MESSAGE.EN: But still, I advanced,
MESSAGE.Translation: But still, I advanced,

MESSAGE.JP: 力の限り。
MESSAGE.EN: with all my body and soul,
MESSAGE.Translation: with all my body and soul,

MESSAGE.JP: 先を。
MESSAGE.EN: toward that most distant goal.
MESSAGE.Translation: toward that most distant goal.

MESSAGE.JP: 果てを。
MESSAGE.EN: To reach that farthest point.
MESSAGE.Translation: To reach that farthest point.

MESSAGE.JP: 先はない。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no end ahead.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no end ahead.

MESSAGE.JP: 果てはない。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no such thing as the farthest point.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no such thing as the farthest point.

MESSAGE.JP: あって、ない。
MESSAGE.EN: There is, yet there is not.
MESSAGE.Translation: There is, yet there is not.

MESSAGE.JP: ぼく。
MESSAGE.EN: Myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Myself.

MESSAGE.JP: そら。
MESSAGE.EN: The sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sky.

MESSAGE.JP: うみ。
MESSAGE.EN: The sea.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sea.

MESSAGE.JP: あお。
MESSAGE.EN: The blue.
MESSAGE.Translation: The blue.

MESSAGE.JP: 目に入るのは、ただそれだけ。
MESSAGE.EN: Those were all I could see now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those were all I could see now.

MESSAGE.JP: もう、どれだけ泳いだだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea how far I had swum.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea how far I had swum.

MESSAGE.JP: 振り返ることは、こわくてできない。
MESSAGE.EN: It was too scary to turn around and see.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was too scary to turn around and see.

MESSAGE.JP: 水温は感じなくなっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I could no longer feel the coldness of the water.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could no longer feel the coldness of the water.

MESSAGE.JP: 着ているはずの服の感触もない。
MESSAGE.EN: I no longer felt encumbered by my clothing, either.
MESSAGE.Translation: I no longer felt encumbered by my clothing, either.

MESSAGE.JP: どこまでが空で、どこまでが海だろう。
MESSAGE.EN: From whence did the sky begin? Where did the sea end?
MESSAGE.Translation: From whence did the sky begin? Where did the sea end?

MESSAGE.JP: どこまでが直枝理樹で、どこからが海なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Where did Riki Naoe end? Where did the sea begin?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where did Riki Naoe end? Where did the sea begin?

MESSAGE.JP: 境界は、もう曖昧だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The borders were already too blurred for me to find.
MESSAGE.Translation: The borders were already too blurred for me to find.

MESSAGE.JP: どこまでも、青い。
MESSAGE.EN: Endless blue.
MESSAGE.Translation: Endless blue.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の目に映るのは、ただ一面の青だった。
MESSAGE.EN: All I could see now was the blue.
MESSAGE.Translation: All I could see now was the blue.

MESSAGE.JP: 泳いでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was swimming.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was swimming.

MESSAGE.JP: 飛んでいる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was flying.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was flying.

MESSAGE.JP: もしかしたら、落ちているのかも知れない。
MESSAGE.EN: Or perhaps, I might have been falling.
MESSAGE.Translation: Or perhaps, I might have been falling.

MESSAGE.JP: その違いさえ、定かでなくなる。
MESSAGE.EN: I was too worn out to tell exactly what I was doing right now.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was too worn out to tell exactly what I was doing right now.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は青の中を進んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: The only thing for certain was that I was moving in this blue world.
MESSAGE.Translation: The only thing for certain was that I was moving in this blue world.

MESSAGE.JP: どれくらいの時間が経っただろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered how much time had passed.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered how much time had passed.

MESSAGE.JP: 永遠。
MESSAGE.EN: An eternity?
MESSAGE.Translation: An eternity?

MESSAGE.JP: 一瞬。
MESSAGE.EN: Or, barely a moment?
MESSAGE.Translation: Or, barely a moment?

MESSAGE.JP: 分からない。
MESSAGE.EN: I did not know.
MESSAGE.Translation: I did not know.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の目が、かすかな白を捉えた。
MESSAGE.EN: A white glint at the edge of my vision drew my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: A white glint at the edge of my vision drew my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 青の中にある、点のような白が青の中に浮いている。
MESSAGE.EN: Although it looked as small as a pinhole from here, I could definitely make it out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although it looked as small as a pinhole from here, I could definitely make it out.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 空の青にも、海の青にも染まることなく、ただ漂っている白鳥よ。
MESSAGE.EN: The white bird touched neither by the blue of the sky nor the blue of the sea.
MESSAGE.Translation: The white bird touched neither by the blue of the sky nor the blue of the sea.

MESSAGE.JP: お前は、哀しくはないのか。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Aren't you sad?❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Aren't you sad?❜

MESSAGE.JP: 歌人は、白鳥にそう問いかけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Had the poet asked the bird,
MESSAGE.Translation: Had the poet asked the bird,

MESSAGE.JP: 哀しくなんてありません。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛No, I am not.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛No, I am not.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは、きっとそう答えるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure that would have been her answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure that would have been her answer.

MESSAGE.JP: でもね。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛But there's something I want you to know.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛But there's something I want you to know.❜

MESSAGE.JP: と、僕は手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: I reached out toward her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I reached out toward her.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は哀しいんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛I am sad.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛I am sad.❜

MESSAGE.JP: その歌人と同じように、僕は白鳥を見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like the poet, I was watching the white bird.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like the poet, I was watching the white bird.

MESSAGE.JP: 堪らなく哀しい。
MESSAGE.EN: My mind was filled with sorrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: My mind was filled with sorrow.

MESSAGE.JP: 差し出した手の先には、何も掠らない。
MESSAGE.EN: My outstretched hand touched nothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: My outstretched hand touched nothing.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は届かない場所に手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: I was reaching toward a place forever unreachable.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was reaching toward a place forever unreachable.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が伸ばした手に応えるように、光が射した。
MESSAGE.EN: As if in answer to my extended hand, there was a light.
MESSAGE.Translation: As if in answer to my extended hand, there was a light.

MESSAGE.JP: あたたかな、ひと筋の光だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a single ray of warm light.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a single ray of warm light.

MESSAGE.JP: 透明を青たらしめる、太陽の光だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a ray of sunlight that colored the transparent air blue.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a ray of sunlight that colored the transparent air blue.

MESSAGE.JP: 白い点が浮かび上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: A white spot emerged from it.
MESSAGE.Translation: A white spot emerged from it.

MESSAGE.JP: 白鳥の下に影ができる。
MESSAGE.EN: Under the white bird, there was a shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Under the white bird, there was a shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: 影が、伸びる。
MESSAGE.EN: And the shadow expanded,
MESSAGE.Translation: And the shadow expanded,

MESSAGE.JP: 僕に向かって伸びてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: growing right toward me.
MESSAGE.Translation: growing right toward me.

MESSAGE.JP: 白鳥には手が届かない。
MESSAGE.EN: I could not reach the bird.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could not reach the bird.

MESSAGE.JP: でも。
MESSAGE.EN: However.
MESSAGE.Translation: However.

MESSAGE.JP: 伸びてくるその影になら――。
MESSAGE.EN: I should be able to――
MESSAGE.Translation: I should be able to――

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は触れることが――。
MESSAGE.EN: ――touch――
MESSAGE.Translation: ――touch――

MESSAGE.JP: ――できる。
MESSAGE.EN: ――its shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: ――its shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: 触れた。
MESSAGE.EN: And I did.
MESSAGE.Translation: And I did.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の右手が、白鳥の影を捉えた。
MESSAGE.EN: My right hand met the shadow of the white bird.
MESSAGE.Translation: My right hand met the shadow of the white bird.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らは、決して交わらない。
MESSAGE.EN: We could never mix with each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: We could never mix with each other.

MESSAGE.JP: 触れたと思った姿は、心は、この影のように曖昧なものでしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: What I believed I had touched of her and her mind was but a mere shadow too.
MESSAGE.Translation: What I believed I had touched of her and her mind was but a mere shadow too.

MESSAGE.JP: 約束も確信も、全ては幻なのかも知れない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even our promises or my determination could all be but imagination.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even our promises or my determination could all be but imagination.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも、僕らは――。
MESSAGE.EN: Even if that was the case...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even if that was the case...

MESSAGE.JP: ともに、あるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...we could be together.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...we could be together.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はその絆を握った。
MESSAGE.EN: And now I was holding the bond between her and I.
MESSAGE.Translation: And now I was holding the bond between her and I.

MESSAGE.JP: もう、二度と離さない。
MESSAGE.EN: I would not let it go ever again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I would not let it go ever again.

MESSAGE.JP: 力が抜ける。
MESSAGE.EN: My strength was slowly draining away.
MESSAGE.Translation: My strength was slowly draining away.

MESSAGE.JP: 体が沈んでいくのが分かる。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt my body sinking down into the water.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt my body sinking down into the water.

MESSAGE.JP: 参ったな。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, I'll be.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, I'll be.

MESSAGE.JP: どうやら、限界みたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems this is as far as I can go.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems this is as far as I can go.

MESSAGE.JP: もうちょっと、体力付けておけばよかったなあ。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess I should have exercised more regularly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess I should have exercised more regularly.

MESSAGE.JP: 何も見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: I could not see anything at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could not see anything at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はどこにいるのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Where was I?
MESSAGE.Translation: Where was I?

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はいつにいるのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: When was I?
MESSAGE.Translation: When was I?

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「ねえ、お姉ちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You know what, Sis.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You know what, Sis.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すぐ傍のような、すごく遠くのような場所から、声が聞こえてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Midori's voice sounded as though it was both right next to me and far, far away.
MESSAGE.Translation: Midori's voice sounded as though it was both right next to me and far, far away.

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「わたしを、またお姉ちゃんと呼んでくれるのですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝I never thought you would call me that again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝I never thought you would call me that again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「…美鳥」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝...Midori.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝...Midori.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「当たり前じゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Of course I do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Of course I do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あたしは…ずっと、お姉ちゃんのことを見ていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I have... always been watching you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I have... always been watching you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「だって、あたしはお姉ちゃんのことが、好きだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Because I love you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Because I love you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「昔から、今まで。ずーっと、その気持ちは変わらないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I have loved you ever since we were children.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I have loved you ever since we were children.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「…お姉ちゃんは勘違いをしていたみたいだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝...I think you've misunderstood me, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝...I think you've misunderstood me, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「でも美鳥は…わたしのことを恨んでいるのでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝But you despise me... don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝But you despise me... don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「わたしはあなたにひどいことをしました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝I did something terrible to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝I did something terrible to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「妹のあなたのことを忘れて、ひとり残ってしまった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝I forgot about you, my little sister, and left you behind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝I forgot about you, my little sister, and left you behind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「本当なら、わたしがあなたの代わりに消えるべきだったんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝I should have been the one to disappear; not you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝I should have been the one to disappear; not you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「…なのに、わたしが残ってしまった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝...But I ended up staying.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝...But I ended up staying.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの声が哀しげに震えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice was trembling with sorrow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice was trembling with sorrow.

MESSAGE.JP: その声に、美鳥が応える。
MESSAGE.EN: Midori responded to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Midori responded to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あの日、お姉ちゃんがあたしの名前を答えられなかったせいで、あたしは忘れられてしまった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝That day, you forgot me because you couldn't say my name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝That day, you forgot me because you couldn't say my name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「お姉ちゃんが忘れてしまったせいで、あたしは消えた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I was gone because you forgot me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I was gone because you forgot me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「ごめんね。本当に…ごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝I'm sorry. I really am...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝I'm sorry. I really am...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが、何度も同じ言葉を繰り返す。
MESSAGE.EN: She apologized over and over again.
MESSAGE.Translation: She apologized over and over again.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「でもね――」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: その一拍の間を、僕は優しいと感じる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her pause felt filled with gentleness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her pause felt filled with gentleness.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「思い出してくれた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You remembered me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You remembered me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「お姉ちゃんは、あたしのことを忘れてなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You never did completely forget about me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You never did completely forget about me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「だから、またこうして会うことができた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝That's why we were able to meet again like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝That's why we were able to meet again like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「それで充分だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝That's enough for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝That's enough for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「ですが…わたしは美鳥のことを忘れた自分が許せませんでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Nevertheless... I could not forgive myself for forgetting you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Nevertheless... I could not forgive myself for forgetting you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「だから、わたしはあなたと代わるつもりだった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝So I was going to trade places with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝So I was going to trade places with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「あなたに代わって、『あの場所』に行きたかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝And I was going to go to that place in your stead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝And I was going to go to that place in your stead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「その日が来るのを、ずっと待っていたのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Even though I was waiting for the day to come...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Even though I was waiting for the day to come...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「どうして、また美鳥が消えなくてはいけないんですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Why do you have to disappear again?!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Why do you have to disappear again?!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが叫ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: She asked shrilly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She asked shrilly.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「ねえ、子供の頃に遊んだこと覚えてる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Hey, remember our childhood?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Hey, remember our childhood?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 対する美鳥の声は、あくまでも優しい。
MESSAGE.EN: Midori, on the other hand, still spoke tenderly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Midori, on the other hand, still spoke tenderly.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「お姉ちゃんが雲を見ては、馬や女の子だって言ってたでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝When we were watching clouds, you would point out the ones that looked like a horse or a girl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝When we were watching clouds, you would point out the ones that looked like a horse or a girl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「それから、お姉ちゃんが色んな話をしてくれるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝And you told me many stories you made based on them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝And you told me many stories you made based on them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「はい…、忘れるわけがありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Of course... how can I forget?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Of course... how can I forget?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「あの時…わたしは、あなたを傷つけてしまった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝At that time... I hurt your feelings.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝At that time... I hurt your feelings.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「美鳥は見えないって言ったのに…わたしは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝You told me they didn't look like anything to you, but I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝You told me they didn't look like anything to you, but I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥の声が、その言葉を途中で遮った。
MESSAGE.EN: Midori interjected.
MESSAGE.Translation: Midori interjected.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あれはね、仕方ないんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝That's not the point.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝That's not the point.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「だって、わたしは『空っぽ』だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝That's because I am empty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝That's because I am empty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「空に浮かぶ雲みたいに、あやふやでぼんやりとしていて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I am as vague and ill-defined as a cloud in the sky.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I am as vague and ill-defined as a cloud in the sky.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「それがたまたま、人の形に見えた。だから、お姉ちゃんはそれを人だと思った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝And my shape happened to look like that of a girl, so you thought of me as a person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝And my shape happened to look like that of a girl, so you thought of me as a person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あたしを…妹だと思った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You thought of me... as your little sister.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You thought of me... as your little sister.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「だから…あたしには、雲が他の何かに見えるわけがなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝That's why... I couldn't see a cloud as something else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝That's why... I couldn't see a cloud as something else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「お姉ちゃん、あたしは最初からそういう存在なの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Because I was the same kind of thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Because I was the same kind of thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「いつかは風に吹かれて散ってしまう雲みたいに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝No different from a cloud blown about by the wind. One that would eventually disappear...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝No different from a cloud blown about by the wind. One that would eventually disappear...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「ううん、それはちょっと違うかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝No, I suppose that's not quite right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝No, I suppose that's not quite right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あたしはいなくなるけれど、でも消えるわけじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I'm going to have to leave, but it doesn't mean I'm going to disappear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I'm going to have to leave, but it doesn't mean I'm going to disappear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あたしにもやっと分かった。あたしが、これからどうなるのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I finally understand what's going to happen to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I finally understand what's going to happen to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「『空っぽ』は満たされて、一杯になったの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I'm filled to the brim. I'm no longer empty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I'm filled to the brim. I'm no longer empty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「もし雲が青かったら、きっと青い空に溶けて見えなくなる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝If clouds were blue, they would blend in with the sky.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝If clouds were blue, they would blend in with the sky.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「でも、確かに雲は空にあるのだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝But even so, they would still be there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝But even so, they would still be there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あたしは満たされて、世界に溶けるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I am now so completely filled that I am going to blend into the world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I am now so completely filled that I am going to blend into the world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「これからは、空気みたいにずっと一緒だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝And I'm going to be able to be with you all the time, like the air that surrounds you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝And I'm going to be able to be with you all the time, like the air that surrounds you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「なぜ…美鳥が満たされるのですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝What... filled you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝What... filled you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「あなたは何も得ていない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝You have given me so much but received nothing in return.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝You have given me so much but received nothing in return.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「わたしばかりが…あの暖かい手に触れた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝I was the only one... that touched your warm hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝I was the only one... that touched your warm hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「伸ばされた手を掴んで、そして…満たされた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝By seizing that hand, I then became... whole.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝By seizing that hand, I then became... whole.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「だから…あたしも満たされたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝That's what filled me too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝That's what filled me too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「お姉ちゃんは、他の誰でもない『西園美魚』になるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You won't have to be anybody else but ❛Mio Nishizono.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You won't have to be anybody else but ❛Mio Nishizono.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「だって、理樹君が、これからはお姉ちゃんの隣りにいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Because Riki-kun is going to be with you from now on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Because Riki-kun is going to be with you from now on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「お姉ちゃんは、これから理樹君の隣りにいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝And you are going to be with him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝And you are going to be with him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「誰か大切な人が傍にいて、初めて人は『自分』になるの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You can be ❛yourself❜ only by being with somebody precious to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You can be ❛yourself❜ only by being with somebody precious to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「他の誰でもない、自分。お姉ちゃんは、それを『孤独』と呼んだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Not anybody else, but yourself. You called that ❛isolation.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Not anybody else, but yourself. You called that ❛isolation.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「それが、お姉ちゃんが本当に手に入れたかったものだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝It's exactly what you've been longing for all along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝It's exactly what you've been longing for all along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「だから、あたしは満たされたの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝That's why I have no regrets now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝That's why I have no regrets now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「意地悪ばかりして、ごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I'm sorry for teasing you so much.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I'm sorry for teasing you so much.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あはは、理樹君にも謝らなくちゃね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Ahaha, I must apologize to Riki-kun, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Ahaha, I must apologize to Riki-kun, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あたしはもう会えないから、お姉ちゃんが代わりに謝っておいてくれるかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝But I won't see him again, so will you do so on my behalf?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝But I won't see him again, so will you do so on my behalf?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「…はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝...I will.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝...I will.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「じゃあ、影を返すね。今まで貸してくれて、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Then I'm giving you your shadow back. Thanks for lending it to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Then I'm giving you your shadow back. Thanks for lending it to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「美鳥…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Midori...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Midori...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「お姉ちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Sis.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Sis.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「さよならは、言わないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝I'm not going to say goodbye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝I'm not going to say goodbye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「これからも、あたしもずっと傍にいるからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Because I'm always going to be with you from now on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Because I'm always going to be with you from now on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「もう、お話はできないのですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Will we be able to talk?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Will we be able to talk?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「もう、顔を見ることもできないのですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Will we see each other?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Will we see each other?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝No.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝No.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「だったら、やっぱりお別れじゃないですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝Then isn't this goodbye?!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝Then isn't this goodbye?!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「ううん、違うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝No, it isn't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝No, it isn't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「お姉ちゃんが、何時までもあたしが傍にいると思う限りは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝As long as you believe I'm right here,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝As long as you believe I'm right here,❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あたし達は、ずっと一緒だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝we will be together forever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝we will be together forever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …ダメだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That's it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That's it.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりの会話も遠くになっていく。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't hear what they were saying anymore.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't hear what they were saying anymore.

MESSAGE.JP: いよいよ、僕の体は沈んでいく。
MESSAGE.EN: My body was sinking...
MESSAGE.Translation: My body was sinking...

MESSAGE.JP: 暗く、深く、黒い、底へと。
MESSAGE.EN: ...toward the dark, deep bottom.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...toward the dark, deep bottom.

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「あはは、最後にやらなくちゃいけないことがあるみたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Ahaha, looks like there's one more thing I must do before I leave.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Ahaha, looks like there's one more thing I must do before I leave.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「じゃあね、お姉ちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Take care, Sis.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Take care, Sis.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美魚@「はい。…わたしの大切な、美鳥」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mio@❝I will. Midori... my precious sister.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mio@❝I will. Midori... my precious sister.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二人@「これからは…ずっと一緒に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sisters@❝We will be... together forever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sisters@❝We will be... together forever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 微かに聞こえるふたりの声が重なった。
MESSAGE.EN: The chorus of their voices reached my ears as though from a great distance.
MESSAGE.Translation: The chorus of their voices reached my ears as though from a great distance.

MESSAGE.JP: その声を最後に、僕の意識は遠のいていく。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the last thing I heard before my consciousness began to fade.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the last thing I heard before my consciousness began to fade.

MESSAGE.JP: もう少し、もう少しだったのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was almost there... I had almost reached her...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was almost there... I had almost reached her...

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「まったく、最後まで面倒かけるんだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝Geez, a bother to the end.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝Geez, a bother to the end.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `美鳥@「しょうがないなあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Midori@❝You really are hopeless,❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Midori@❝You really are hopeless,❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹君は――。
MESSAGE.EN: Riki-kun...
MESSAGE.Translation: Riki-kun...

MESSAGE.JP: 小さな手が僕を支える。
MESSAGE.EN: Small hands supported me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Small hands supported me.

MESSAGE.JP: その声が、僕の体を僅かに押し上げた。
MESSAGE.EN: And with that, my body was pushed gently upward.
MESSAGE.Translation: And with that, my body was pushed gently upward.

MESSAGE.JP: 最初に感じたのは、温度だった。
MESSAGE.EN: What I first felt was warmth.
MESSAGE.Translation: What I first felt was warmth.

MESSAGE.EN: 36.5 degrees Celsius.
MESSAGE.Translation: 36.5 degrees Celsius.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、人の体温。
MESSAGE.EN: That was the temperature of a human being.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was the temperature of a human being.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰かが僕に触れている。
MESSAGE.EN: Somebody was touching me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Somebody was touching me.

MESSAGE.JP: 次に耳。
MESSAGE.EN: Second, my ears registered a voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Second, my ears registered a voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 呼びかける声に、僕は徐々に意識を取り戻す。
MESSAGE.EN: Little by little, I was regaining consciousness.
MESSAGE.Translation: Little by little, I was regaining consciousness.

MESSAGE.JP: 目を閉じたままでも、僕の前に誰かが立っているのが分かった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even with my eyes closed, I could feel the presence of somebody standing right before me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even with my eyes closed, I could feel the presence of somebody standing right before me.

MESSAGE.JP: 頭上を照らしていた太陽の光が、今は遮られている。
MESSAGE.EN: Something blocked the sunlight from shining on my face.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something blocked the sunlight from shining on my face.

MESSAGE.JP: 吐息がかかるほどすぐ傍に、誰かがいる。
MESSAGE.EN: There was someone so close to me I felt their breath on my face.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was someone so close to me I felt their breath on my face.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は、ようやくうっすらと目を開ける。
MESSAGE.EN: I finally managed to open my eyes slightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I finally managed to open my eyes slightly.

MESSAGE.JP: 『誰か』はぼんやりとかすんで、よく見えない。
MESSAGE.EN: My eyesight was too blurred to recognize who it was.
MESSAGE.Translation: My eyesight was too blurred to recognize who it was.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも、僕は確信して名前を呼ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, I called her name with certainty.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, I called her name with certainty.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…西園さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `影@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Shadow@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Shadow@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 影が、答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: The figure responded.
MESSAGE.Translation: The figure responded.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…み、お」
`影@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Shadow@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Shadow@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園、美魚…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mio... Nishizono...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mio... Nishizono...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が名前を呼ぶ度、影が輪郭を成していく。
MESSAGE.EN: Every time I called her name, the figure grew clearer in my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: Every time I called her name, the figure grew clearer in my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして、その輪郭は僕のよく知る女の子になる。
MESSAGE.EN: And eventually I was able to see the girl I knew it would be.
MESSAGE.Translation: And eventually I was able to see the girl I knew it would be.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の言葉が、ひとりの少女の姿を見せる。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the girl I'd been wanting to see.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the girl I'd been wanting to see.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん、なんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You are... Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You are... Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは覆いかぶさるように、僕を覗き込んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was peering down at my face.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was peering down at my face.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Thank goodness.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Thank goodness.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの口から、安堵の息がもれる。
MESSAGE.EN: A sigh of relief came out of her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: A sigh of relief came out of her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「全然目を覚まさないので、心配…しました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I was worried because you showed no sign of waking up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I was worried because you showed no sign of waking up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh, yeah.
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh, yeah.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はおぼれたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had been on the verge of drowning.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had been on the verge of drowning.

MESSAGE.JP: 今更のように思い至る。
MESSAGE.EN: That had slipped my mind until I saw the concern on her face.
MESSAGE.Translation: That had slipped my mind until I saw the concern on her face.

MESSAGE.JP: 熟練したスイマーでさえ着衣のまま泳ぐのは難しいって聞いたことがある。
MESSAGE.EN: They say that even proficient swimmers find it hard to swim wearing clothes.
MESSAGE.Translation: They say that even proficient swimmers find it hard to swim wearing clothes.

MESSAGE.JP: …運動、あまり得意じゃないんだけどね。
MESSAGE.EN: ...And to be honest, I'm not in great shape.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And to be honest, I'm not in great shape.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、なんとか大丈夫」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think I'm okay somehow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think I'm okay somehow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気づけば、びしょぬれの服が体に張り付いて気持ち悪い。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt pretty unpleasant with my soaked clothes sticking to my body.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt pretty unpleasant with my soaked clothes sticking to my body.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ははは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気まずさが先立って、笑ってごまかした。
MESSAGE.EN: I was feeling so awkward I couldn't help but laugh.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was feeling so awkward I couldn't help but laugh.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「本当に…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Honestly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Honestly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの涙ぐむ声に、僕はようやく自分がいる状況を実感することができた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her teary voice made me at last aware of the gravity of the situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her teary voice made me at last aware of the gravity of the situation.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さんは、馬鹿です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, you're such a fool.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, you're such a fool.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どうして、わたしのために…あんなことまで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Why would you do something so dangerous for me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Why would you do something so dangerous for me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕のすぐ間近に、西園さんがいる。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san was right beside me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san was right beside me.

MESSAGE.JP: 太陽を背に逆光になっているせいで、西園さんの顔は影となり、はっきりと見ることができない。
MESSAGE.EN: Because the sun was directly behind her back, I couldn't see her face clearly from the shadow it cast.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because the sun was directly behind her back, I couldn't see her face clearly from the shadow it cast.

MESSAGE.JP: それがちょっと残念だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was a shame.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was a shame.

MESSAGE.JP: …逆光？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Wait a minute.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Wait a minute.

MESSAGE.EN: ...Shadow?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Shadow?

MESSAGE.JP: 光源が背後にあれば、前に向かって影ができる。
MESSAGE.EN: If there was light behind you, your shadow would be in front of you.
MESSAGE.Translation: If there was light behind you, your shadow would be in front of you.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの体が太陽を遮っているから、僕の体にはその影が落ちる。
MESSAGE.EN: Therefore, because her back was facing the sun, her shadow fell on me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Therefore, because her back was facing the sun, her shadow fell on me.

MESSAGE.JP: 当然のことだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was a given.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was a given.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰も改めて意識することさえない自然現象が今、僕の目の前で起きている。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a most basic natural phenomenon.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a most basic natural phenomenon.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん、影がっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, your shadow!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, your shadow!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 影が――戻っている。
MESSAGE.EN: Her shadow... was back.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her shadow... was back.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は飛び起きた。
MESSAGE.EN: I shot up with a jerk.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shot up with a jerk.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの影が僕にかかっている。
MESSAGE.EN: I was being wrapped in her shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was being wrapped in her shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: 影があるのは服の部分だけじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, I was not talking about just the shadow of her clothing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, I was not talking about just the shadow of her clothing.

MESSAGE.JP: 今更ながら、西園さんが日傘をしていないことにも気づく。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed she also wasn't holding her parasol any longer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed she also wasn't holding her parasol any longer.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんには影がある。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san had a shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san had a shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女自身が生み出す、影が。
MESSAGE.EN: She now cast her own shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: She now cast her own shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: お別れ、だね。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛It's time we say our farewells.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛It's time we say our farewells.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥の声がよみがえる。
MESSAGE.EN: I remembered Midori's words.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remembered Midori's words.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「美鳥が…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Midori...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Midori...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの影だった、美鳥。
MESSAGE.EN: She had been Nishizono-san's shadow.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had been Nishizono-san's shadow.

MESSAGE.JP: 『西園美魚』になろうとした美鳥。
MESSAGE.EN: She had been trying to become ❛Mio Nishizono.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: She had been trying to become ❛Mio Nishizono.❜

MESSAGE.JP: …いや、本当はそうじゃなかったことを、僕はもう知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: ...No, now I knew that wasn't really the case.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...No, now I knew that wasn't really the case.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の体を支えた声は、確かに美鳥のものだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The voice that had supported my body was unmistakably hers.
MESSAGE.Translation: The voice that had supported my body was unmistakably hers.

MESSAGE.JP: …僕を助けたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She had saved me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She had saved me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん、美鳥の言葉は僕も確かに聞いたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, I heard Midori.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, I heard Midori.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…そう、ですか。直枝さんも、聞きましたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Oh, is that so... You heard that too?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Oh, is that so... You heard that too?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: すぐ傍にいるはずの美鳥に向かって、僕は呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I murmured to Midori, who was supposed to be with us.
MESSAGE.Translation: I murmured to Midori, who was supposed to be with us.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あの子は…ここにいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝She's... right here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝She's... right here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声が震えている。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice was shaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice was shaking.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしの隣りに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Right next to me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Right next to me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それから、直枝さんの隣りにも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝And next to you, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝And next to you, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「どうやら、独りになりそこねてしまったみたいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Apparently, I failed to become alone, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Apparently, I failed to become alone, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして、微笑んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She then smiled.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then smiled.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「これからは、ずっと一緒です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝She and I will always be together from this moment on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝She and I will always be together from this moment on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一緒。
MESSAGE.EN: Together.
MESSAGE.Translation: Together.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんと美鳥は、もう離れないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Yeah, I was certain nothing could separate the two girls anymore,
MESSAGE.Translation: Yeah, I was certain nothing could separate the two girls anymore,

MESSAGE.JP: …もともとは、ひとりだったんだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because they were by their very nature one.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because they were by their very nature one.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、僕たちも離れない。
MESSAGE.EN: And, we would not part either.
MESSAGE.Translation: And, we would not part either.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、僕たちはもともとは他人同士だ。
MESSAGE.EN: But that wasn't the same as the link between Midori and her.
MESSAGE.Translation: But that wasn't the same as the link between Midori and her.

MESSAGE.JP: だから――。
MESSAGE.EN: So――
MESSAGE.Translation: So――

MESSAGE.JP: 何もしなければ、何も始まらない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to take the first step.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to take the first step.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんが、好きです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, I love you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, I love you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 想いを、言葉にする。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to voice my feelings.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to voice my feelings.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんからの返事はない。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 目を閉じて、考え込んでいるみたいだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed lost in thought, her eyes closed...
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed lost in thought, her eyes closed...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は待つ。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to wait.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to wait.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの口が開くのを。
MESSAGE.EN: For her to open her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: For her to open her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: どんな言葉が紡ぎ出されようと、受け止めるつもりでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was prepared for whatever she might say.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was prepared for whatever she might say.

MESSAGE.JP: まだ、答えはない。
MESSAGE.EN: She was still silent,
MESSAGE.Translation: She was still silent,

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは小刻みに震えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: but she seemed to be shaking slightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: but she seemed to be shaking slightly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…西園さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Nishizono-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Nishizono-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 気分でも悪いんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Is she feeling ill?
MESSAGE.Translation: Is she feeling ill?

MESSAGE.JP: …まさか、僕が告白したせいで。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Wait, is it because I told her I loved her?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Wait, is it because I told her I loved her?

MESSAGE.JP: ごめん、と思わず謝ろうとした時。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as I was about to instinctively apologize to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as I was about to instinctively apologize to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いつまで待たせるんですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝How long are you going to keep me waiting?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝How long are you going to keep me waiting?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ようやく出た言葉は予想外で、僕は戸惑う。
MESSAGE.EN: Her unexpected question confused me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her unexpected question confused me.

MESSAGE.JP: 待たされているのは、僕の方だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Was I not the one waiting here?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was I not the one waiting here?

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが、爪先立ちで浮いていたかかとを砂浜に下ろす。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san lowered her raised heels on the sand; she had been standing on tiptoe.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san lowered her raised heels on the sand; she had been standing on tiptoe.

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、だから震えていたんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That explained her shaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: That explained her shaking.

MESSAGE.JP: 足を踏み出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a step toward her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a step toward her.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんに近づく。
MESSAGE.EN: And then closed the distance with another.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then closed the distance with another.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の言葉は、西園さんに届いた。
MESSAGE.EN: My feelings had reached her.
MESSAGE.Translation: My feelings had reached her.

MESSAGE.JP: 淡い桜の色をした西園さんの唇。
MESSAGE.EN: Her light pink lips.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her light pink lips.

MESSAGE.JP: 触れた途端に消えてしまうんじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Would she disappear as soon as I touched them?
MESSAGE.Translation: Would she disappear as soon as I touched them?

MESSAGE.JP: それは、もう抱かなくてよいはずのおそれだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was a fear I could put behind me now.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was a fear I could put behind me now.

MESSAGE.JP: だから。
MESSAGE.EN: So the reason I hesitated right before kissing her...
MESSAGE.Translation: So the reason I hesitated right before kissing her...

MESSAGE.JP: 初め、おそるおそるその柔らかな唇に触れたのは、単に僕がどきどきしていたから。
MESSAGE.EN: ...was because my heart was pounding so hard with excitement.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...was because my heart was pounding so hard with excitement.

MESSAGE.JP: その表面は湿っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her lips were sweetly moist.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her lips were sweetly moist.

MESSAGE.JP: 目を閉じた西園さんの顔は目の前だ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no longer any distance between us.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no longer any distance between us.

MESSAGE.JP: まぶたを震わせ、僕を受け容れる。
MESSAGE.EN: She had accepted me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had accepted me.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんを抱く僕の腕に力が入る。
MESSAGE.EN: I embraced her tighter.
MESSAGE.Translation: I embraced her tighter.

MESSAGE.JP: 舌で舐めるように。
MESSAGE.EN: I licked her tongue.
MESSAGE.Translation: I licked her tongue.

MESSAGE.JP: 唇でついばむように。
MESSAGE.EN: I pecked her lips.
MESSAGE.Translation: I pecked her lips.

MESSAGE.JP: 優しく。
MESSAGE.EN: Gently.
MESSAGE.Translation: Gently.

MESSAGE.JP: ときに、激しく。
MESSAGE.EN: Passionately.
MESSAGE.Translation: Passionately.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と西園さんの唇は触れ合い。
MESSAGE.EN: My lips met hers.
MESSAGE.Translation: My lips met hers.

MESSAGE.JP: その薄い膜が、僕らの体温を互いに伝え合う。
MESSAGE.EN: Through that thin membrane, we felt each other's body heat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Through that thin membrane, we felt each other's body heat.

MESSAGE.JP: ああ――。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah...
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah...

MESSAGE.JP: どれほど触れようとも。
MESSAGE.EN: No matter how tightly we may hold on to each other,
MESSAGE.Translation: No matter how tightly we may hold on to each other,

MESSAGE.JP: 隔てられた僕らは、決して交わらない。
MESSAGE.EN: we are separate and can never blend into each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: we are separate and can never blend into each other.

MESSAGE.JP: でも――伝わる。
MESSAGE.EN: But... we can pass our feelings along to each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: But... we can pass our feelings along to each other.

MESSAGE.JP: それで――充分じゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: That is enough for me.
MESSAGE.Translation: That is enough for me.

MESSAGE.JP: ああ接吻　海そのままに　日は行かず$d鳥翔ひながら$d死せ果てよ　いま
MESSAGE.EN:
I wish this instant when our lips meet would ne'er end,
the sea's tumult fail, the sun freeze on its journey,
the birds high above stop dead.
MESSAGE.Translation:
I wish this instant when our lips meet would ne'er end,
the sea's tumult fail, the sun freeze on its journey,
the birds high above stop dead.

MESSAGE.JP: 永遠にして。
MESSAGE.EN: It's an eternity,
MESSAGE.Translation: It's an eternity,

MESSAGE.JP: 一瞬。
MESSAGE.EN: but an instant.
MESSAGE.Translation: but an instant.

MESSAGE.JP: 白鳥は哀しからずや空の青
MESSAGE.EN: Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad?
MESSAGE.Translation: Bird with wings of white, I wonder, is she not sad?

MESSAGE.JP: $dうみのあをにも染まず
MESSAGE.EN: $dLeft alone, ne'er touched
MESSAGE.Translation: $dLeft alone, ne'er touched

MESSAGE.JP: $dただよふ
MESSAGE.EN: $dby the blue of yonder sky, or the blue of hither sea.
MESSAGE.Translation: $dby the blue of yonder sky, or the blue of hither sea.

MESSAGE.JP: 孤独にして。
MESSAGE.EN: We are alone,
MESSAGE.Translation: We are alone,

MESSAGE.JP: 一緒。
MESSAGE.EN: but together.
MESSAGE.Translation: but together.

MESSAGE.JP: 時間よ、止まれ。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish time would stop.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish time would stop.

MESSAGE.JP: 今よ、永遠に。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish this moment would last forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish this moment would last forever.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らはずっと、僕らのまま。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish we would remain thus indefinitely.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish we would remain thus indefinitely.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らはずっと、一緒。
MESSAGE.EN: I wish we would be together for eternity.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wish we would be together for eternity.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Phew.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Phew.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 息が続かない、というどうしようもなく即物的な理由で僕らの初めての口づけは終わりを告げた。
MESSAGE.EN: But our first kiss didn't last too long for a very physical reason: we ran out of breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: But our first kiss didn't last too long for a very physical reason: we ran out of breath.

MESSAGE.JP: どちらからともなく唇を離す。
MESSAGE.EN: Our lips parted.
MESSAGE.Translation: Our lips parted.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らは黙ったまましばらく、見つめ合っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: For the next few seconds, we were gazing into each other's' eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: For the next few seconds, we were gazing into each other's' eyes.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんから、どうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You go first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You go first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「い、いえ。直枝さんがお先に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝N-no, go ahead.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝N-no, go ahead.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、西園さんが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, you go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, you go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いえ、直枝さんが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No, you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No, you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、西園さんが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いえ、直枝さんが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No, you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No, you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ぷっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Puh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Puh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…くす」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...eheh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...eheh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あははは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahahaha.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahahaha.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「うふふ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Uhuhu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Uhuhu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 見つめ合ったまま、笑った。
MESSAGE.EN: We both laughed, staring into each other's eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: We both laughed, staring into each other's eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、僕から……」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well then, let me go first......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well then, let me go first......❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんっ、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san, I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう言って、僕は頭を下げる。
MESSAGE.EN: I bowed my head to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bowed my head to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん…もし謝る理由が、キスをしたからだったら、わたしは怒りますよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san... if you are apologizing about the kiss, I will be angry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san... if you are apologizing about the kiss, I will be angry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしが望んだから、直枝さんにしてもらったのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I did that because I wanted to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I did that because I wanted to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、その、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Um, well, I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Um, well, I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「くすっ、また謝りましたね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Huhu, there you go apologizing again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Huhu, there you go apologizing again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、ごめん…じゃなくて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I mean... I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I mean... I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その…僕、初めてじゃないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You know... that wasn't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You know... that wasn't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「キス、するの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...my first kiss.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...my first kiss.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 美鳥との一件を思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I remembered what had happened between Midori and me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I remembered what had happened between Midori and me.

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: …なんか、怒ってる？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Is she mad?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Is she mad?

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ぷっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Puh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Puh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: と思ったら…吹き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: She burst into laughter.
MESSAGE.Translation: She burst into laughter.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん、それはまるで女の子みたいな台詞です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You sounded just like a girl there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You sounded just like a girl there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…何かと思えば、そんなことですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I never imagined you were worried about such a little thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I never imagined you were worried about such a little thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そんなことって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Such a little thing...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Such a little thing...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、怒ってない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, you aren't mad?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, you aren't mad?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい…それに、そんなことを言うなら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No... And as a matter of fact...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No... And as a matter of fact...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしも初めてでは、ありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That wasn't my first kiss, either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That wasn't my first kiss, either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: えーっっっっっっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Whaaaaaat!?
MESSAGE.Translation: Whaaaaaat!?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、それって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A-are you serious!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A-are you serious!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが顔を赤らめる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her face was slightly flushed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her face was slightly flushed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「相手は恭介、それとも謙吾…まさか、真人っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who was the guy? Kyousuke? Kengo? ...Or, Masato!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who was the guy? Kyousuke? Kengo? ...Or, Masato!?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん、今度は怒りますよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, you had better stop or I'll get mad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, you had better stop or I'll get mad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それは…直枝さんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It was... you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It was... you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ぼ、僕ぅっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝M-me!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝M-me!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぜ、全然記憶にない。
MESSAGE.EN: Christ, I can't remember that at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: Christ, I can't remember that at all.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あの、先ほど…人工呼吸を」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Well, a few minutes ago... I gave you mouth to mouth.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Well, a few minutes ago... I gave you mouth to mouth.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「人工呼吸？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mouth... to mouth?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mouth... to mouth?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 思わず、唇を人さし指で撫でる。
MESSAGE.EN: I found myself stroking my lips with my index finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: I found myself stroking my lips with my index finger.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい。目が覚める様子がありませんでしたので、以前に本で読んだ通りに試してみました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes. Like I said, you showed no sign of waking up, so I followed the instructions I remembered reading in a book.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes. Like I said, you showed no sign of waking up, so I followed the instructions I remembered reading in a book.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「まず気道を確保します。左手を直枝さんの額に当てて頭を後ろに反らし、右手を後頭部近くのうなじにおいて持ち上げます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝First off, I checked your mouth for obstructions. Then I put my left hand on your forehead and my right hand on the nape of your neck so that I could tilt your head back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝First off, I checked your mouth for obstructions. Then I put my left hand on your forehead and my right hand on the nape of your neck so that I could tilt your head back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それから、直枝さんの鼻を摘んで、空気が漏れないようにして、わたしの口を大きく開け、直枝さんの口を覆うようにして唇を密着させてから、ゆっくり息を吹き込みました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝After that, I pinched your nose to not let the air escape, covered up your mouth with mine, and then blew air into your lungs as slowly as possible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝After that, I pinched your nose to not let the air escape, covered up your mouth with mine, and then blew air into your lungs as slowly as possible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それを何度も繰り返したんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I did that over and over again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I did that over and over again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …それは全然、ロマンティックじゃないよ。西園さん。
MESSAGE.EN: ...When you say it like that, it doesn't sound very romantic, Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...When you say it like that, it doesn't sound very romantic, Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「慌てたあまり、最初に直枝さんの呼吸を確認するのを忘れてたのですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I should have ascertained whether you were breathing at the start, but I was so shocked...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I should have ascertained whether you were breathing at the start, but I was so shocked...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…直枝さんは意識を失っていただけで自発呼吸はあったので、人工呼吸をする必要はまったくありませんでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Actually, it turned out you were just unconscious, but still breathing. I didn't need to attempt CPR at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Actually, it turned out you were just unconscious, but still breathing. I didn't need to attempt CPR at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それから、少し恥ずかしそうに顔を伏せた。
MESSAGE.EN: She then cast her eyes down, abashed.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then cast her eyes down, abashed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「と、ともかく。ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A-anyway, thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A-anyway, thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さんのおかげで、助かったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You saved me, Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You saved me, Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…それは、違います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...That's not true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...That's not true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 首を横に振る。
MESSAGE.EN: She shook her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shook her head.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…助けられたのは、わたしですよ。直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You're the one who saved me, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You're the one who saved me, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あなたと一緒なら、わたしはこのままでいられるように思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I think I can stay as I am, so long as you're with me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I think I can stay as I am, so long as you're with me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「もう、『わたし』を見失わない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm not going to lose ❛myself❜ ever again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm not going to lose ❛myself❜ ever again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あなたを好きな、西園美魚です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm the Mio Nishizono who loves you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm the Mio Nishizono who loves you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが微笑む。
MESSAGE.EN: She broke into a radiant smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: She broke into a radiant smile.

MESSAGE.JP: その笑顔がいつまでも君とともにありますように。
MESSAGE.EN: I wished.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wished.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は祈る。
MESSAGE.EN: If only that smile could stay on your face forever.
MESSAGE.Translation: If only that smile could stay on your face forever.

MESSAGE.JP: ささやかで。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a small,
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a small,

MESSAGE.JP: はかなくて。
MESSAGE.EN: and fragile,
MESSAGE.Translation: and fragile,

MESSAGE.JP: そして、大切な願い。
MESSAGE.EN: but precious wish.
MESSAGE.Translation: but precious wish.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の愛しいひと。
MESSAGE.EN: She was my beloved.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was my beloved.

MESSAGE.JP: 帰り道、もう陽は暮れ始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: The sun had already started setting on our way back home.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sun had already started setting on our way back home.

MESSAGE.JP: 茜色に沈む夕陽が、僕らの前に影を作る。
MESSAGE.EN: The gentle crimson of the evening sun made our shadows stretch out before us.
MESSAGE.Translation: The gentle crimson of the evening sun made our shadows stretch out before us.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と西園さんは並んで歩いている。
MESSAGE.EN: She and I were walking abreast.
MESSAGE.Translation: She and I were walking abreast.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と西園さんの影も並んで歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: So were our shadows.
MESSAGE.Translation: So were our shadows.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「夕焼けって赤いんですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The setting sun really is red.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The setting sun really is red.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの横顔が、呟く。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san's silhouette murmured by my side.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san's silhouette murmured by my side.

MESSAGE.JP: それは噛みしめるような口調だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She sounded like she had had a profound revelation.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sounded like she had had a profound revelation.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう、だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, true...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, true...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「眩しいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's dazzling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's dazzling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 夕陽に目を向けて、目を細めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I narrowed my eyes as I glanced into the sun.
MESSAGE.Translation: I narrowed my eyes as I glanced into the sun.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう、だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「影が長いです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Our shadows are so long.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Our shadows are so long.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 少し可笑しそうに、西園さんが体を僅かに左右に揺する。
MESSAGE.EN: Amused, she was leaning from side to side.
MESSAGE.Translation: Amused, she was leaning from side to side.

MESSAGE.JP: 合わせて、影も揺れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Her shadow mimicked the movement.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her shadow mimicked the movement.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう、だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…さきほどから同じ台詞ばかりです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You keep saying the same thing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You keep saying the same thing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう、だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、西園さんの感じるままに感じていたかった。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I simply wanted to feel things the way she felt them.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I simply wanted to feel things the way she felt them.

MESSAGE.JP: 同じものを見たかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I just wanted to see things as she saw them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I just wanted to see things as she saw them.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…お坊さんですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You're like a monk.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You're like a monk.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう、だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って、なんなのさ、それ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, wait, what do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, wait, what do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…何でもありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は西園さんの手をそっと握る。
MESSAGE.EN: I grasped her hand gently in mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: I grasped her hand gently in mine.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも、僕たちは無言のままだった。
MESSAGE.EN: We were walking in silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were walking in silence.

MESSAGE.JP: 胸が弾むように心音を刻む。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet my heart was pounding strongly enough to leap out of my chest.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet my heart was pounding strongly enough to leap out of my chest.

MESSAGE.JP: この鼓動は、僕の右手を通じて彼女の左手に伝わっているだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt that her left hand couldn't help but feel my heart thumping through my right hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt that her left hand couldn't help but feel my heart thumping through my right hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 間違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: No, it most certainly did.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, it most certainly did.

MESSAGE.JP: だって、僕の右手にも同じものを感じるのだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because my right hand was feeling hers.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because my right hand was feeling hers.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「聞こえます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I can hear it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I can hear it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 沈黙を破ったのは西園さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san broke the silence.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san broke the silence.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「な、なにが？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He-hear what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He-hear what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…直枝さんの心臓の音」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...The sound of your heart.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...The sound of your heart.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「とくん、とくん、と脈を打っています」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Thump, thump, thump it goes, so strongly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Thump, thump, thump it goes, so strongly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの唇が動くたび、僕の心臓は、ますます早鐘を打つ。
MESSAGE.EN: Each time her lips moved, my heart sped up.
MESSAGE.Translation: Each time her lips moved, my heart sped up.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「打ってなかったら、大変だけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If it weren't, that would be a problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If it weren't, that would be a problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんの左手の人さし指が、握った僕の手の甲を軽く叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: She was tapping on the back of my hand with her index finger.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was tapping on the back of my hand with her index finger.

MESSAGE.JP: とん。
MESSAGE.EN: Tap.
MESSAGE.Translation: Tap.

MESSAGE.JP: とん、とん。
MESSAGE.EN: Tap. Tap.
MESSAGE.Translation: Tap. Tap.

MESSAGE.JP: とん、とん、とん。
MESSAGE.EN: Tap. Tap. Tap.
MESSAGE.Translation: Tap. Tap. Tap.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…同じ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...It's the same.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...It's the same.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…わたしと同じリズムです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...The same rhythm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...The same rhythm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 心地よい刺激。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a comfortable stimulation.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a comfortable stimulation.

MESSAGE.JP: 生きる者が奏でるメロディ。
MESSAGE.EN: A melody produced by all living things.
MESSAGE.Translation: A melody produced by all living things.

MESSAGE.JP: 感じる。
MESSAGE.EN: It could be felt,
MESSAGE.Translation: It could be felt,

MESSAGE.JP: 伝わる。
MESSAGE.EN: and transmitted.
MESSAGE.Translation: and transmitted.

MESSAGE.JP: 触れることで、僕らは知る。
MESSAGE.EN: By touching each other,
MESSAGE.Translation: By touching each other,

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに、ここにいること。
MESSAGE.EN: we could confirm our existence right here and now.
MESSAGE.Translation: we could confirm our existence right here and now.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「生きてる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝We are alive...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝We are alive...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She mumbled.
MESSAGE.Translation: She mumbled.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「不思議だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wonder.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wonder.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…なにがですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...About what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...About what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうして、こんなにドキドキするんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why is it our hearts pound like this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why is it our hearts pound like this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…それは、交感神経が…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...That's because the sympathetic nerves are...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...That's because the sympathetic nerves are...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いえ、不思議ですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No, it really is mysterious.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No, it really is mysterious.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「この先…何度手を繋いだら、この謎は解けるんでしょうか？」
